dǐyù zìrán zāihài 
withstand natural calamities
战胜自然灾害
zhànshèngzìrán zāihài 
conquer natural disasters
这个地区因常年自然灾害，土地瘠瘦，寸草不生。

natural disaster

provide relief to the people in a disaster area

Dàpī yīwù rényuán bēnfù zāiqū jiùzhì shāngbìngyuán。
Large numbers of medical workers hurried to the disaster area to give treatment to the sick and wounded.
在地震灾区进行抢掠的人将被枪决。
Zài dìzhèn zāiqū jìnxíngqiǎnglüè de rén jiāngbèi qiāngjué。
Anyone found looting in the earthquake-stricken area will be shot.

dìzhèn zāiqū
earthquake-stricken area

hàn zāiqū

dìzhèn zāiqū de zhènqíng
situation in the earthquake zone
支援灾区
zhīyuán zāiqū 
give aid (or send relief) to disaster areas
她被报社派去灾区采写新闻。
Tā bèi bàoshè pàiqù zāiqū cǎixiě xīnwén。
She was sent to the disaster area to cover interviews and reports.
我们要帮助群众尽快撤出受灾区域。
Wǒmen yào bāngzhù qúnzhòng jìnkuài chèchū shòuzāi qūyù。
We must help people leave the disaster area.
委员会决定把这笔资金等量发放给灾区的各个农户。
Wěiyuánhuì juédìng bǎ zhè bǐ zījīn děngliàng fāfàng gěi zāiqū de gègè nónghù。
The committee decided to share the capital among the farmers in the disaster-stricken area.
地震发生后，灾区群众住进了临时的防震棚。
Dìzhèn fāshēng hòu，zāiqū qúnzhòng zhù jìn le línshí de fángzhènpéng。
People living in the disaster area moved into temporary earthquake shelters after the earthquake.
直到救援物资到达，灾区的群众已经缺食近一个月了。
Zhídào jiùyuán wùzī dàodá，zāiqū de qúnzhòng yǐjing quēshí jìn yígèyuè le。
By the time relief arrived, the people in the disaster area had already suffered from insufficient food for a month.
救援物资将在十分钟后运抵灾区。
Jiùyuán wùzī jiāng zài shí fēn zhōng hòu yùndǐ zāiqū。
Material aids will arrive at the disaster area in ten minutes.
由于灾情的恶化，政府向灾区增调两千名官兵。
Yóuyú zāiqíng de èhuà，zhèngfǔ xiàng zāiqū zēngdiào liǎng qiān míng guānbīng。
Due to the worsening of the conditions, the government throws 2000 more soldiers to the disaster area.
大家都争先恐后地捐钱给灾区群众。
Dàjiā dōu zhēngxiān kǒnghòu dì juānqián gěi zāiqū qúnzhòng。
People are vying with each other to present money to those living in the disaster area.
灾情过后，病毒在灾区滋蔓。
Zāiqíng guòhòu，bìngdú zài zāiqū zīmàn。
After the natural disaster passed, viruses began to spread in the areas it had affected.
政府把食品划拨给灾区。
Zhèngfǔ bǎ shípǐn huàbō gěi zāiqū.
The government allocated food to the disaster zone.
救援灾区
jiùyuán zāiqū
bring relief to a disaster area
他们为灾区开展募捐活动。
Tāmen wèi zāiqū kāizhǎn mùjuān huódòng.
They launched a campaign to get donations for the disaster area.
灾区生活用品极为匮乏。
Zāiqū shēnghuóyòngpǐn jíwéi kuìfá.
The disaster area is very low in basic necessities.
义卖所得钱款已全部寄往灾区。
Yìmài suǒdé qiánkuǎn yǐ quánbù jìwǎng zāiqū。
All money raised from this charity sale has already been sent to the disaster area.
受灾地区
shòuzāi dìqū
disaster area; stricken (or afflicted, affected) area
该地区发生地震灾情，国家领导驰电慰问。
Gāi dìqū fāshēng dìzhèn zāiqíng，guójiā lǐngdǎo chídiàn wèiwèn。
An earthquake struck that district.  The Chinese leaders hurriedly sent a cable to express their sympathy, and solicitude to people there.
这个地区因常年自然灾害，土地瘠瘦，寸草不生。
Zhège dìqū yīn chángnián zìrán zāihài，tǔdì jíshòu，cùncǎo bùshēng。
Land in this area is barren and no plant can grow here, because there are natural disasters throughout the entire year.
华南地区最近普降暴雨，灾情严重。

Recently, areas in South China are generally suffering from rainstorms, and the situation is very serious.

situation in the earthquake zone

They were lucky not to die up the mountain when their group was struck by disaster.
Tāmen hěn xìngyùn，zài yùdào zāinàn shí méiyǒu sǐzài shān shàng。
他们很幸运，在遇到灾难时没有死在山上。
A land area about the size of the British Isles could have to be abandoned in the wake of a catastrophic accident.
Yí kuài dàyuē shì Búlièdiān qúndǎo miànjī dàxiǎo de lùdì bùdébù yīnwèi yí cì zāinànxìng de shìgù ér fàngqì。
一块大约是不列颠群岛面积大小的陆地不得不因为一次灾难性的事故而放弃。
Disaster may not be as imminent as everyone expects.
Zāinàn kěnéng búshì xiàng měi gèrén yùliào de nàyàng jíjiāng fāshēng。
灾难可能不是象每个人预料的那样即将发生。
The economics of this country is a disaster.
Zhège guójiā de jīngjì zhuàngkuàng shì gè zāinàn。
这个国家的经济状况是个灾难。
The effect on small firms will be disasterous to say the least.
Wǎngqīnglǐshuō，tā duì xiǎoqǐyè de yǐngxiǎng yě jiāng shì zāinànxìng de。
往轻里说，它对小企业的影响也将是灾难性的。
The flood was disastrous to the economy.
Hóngshuǐ duì jīngjì de zuòyòng shì zāinànxìng de。
洪水对经济的作用是灾难性的。
We must act on this disaster, or face dire consequences.
Wǒmen bìxū duì zhè cì zāinàn cǎiqǔ xíngdòng， fǒuzé jiāng miànlín kěpà de hòuguǒ。
我们必须对这次灾难采取行动，否则将面临可怕的后果。
His bad investments have brought him to financial disaster.
Tā de zāogāo tóuzī gěi tā dàiláile cáiwù shàng de zāinàn。
他的糟糕投资给他带来了财务上的灾难。
They headed off a council tax disaster.
Tāmen fángzhǐ yìhuìshuì zāinàn de fāshēng。
他们防止议会税灾难的发生。
In the event of a disaster, please pray.
Wànyī zāinàn fāshēngle，jiù qǐng qídǎo bā。
万一灾难发生了，就请祈祷吧。
There is no doubt that he will be out of office after this disaster.
Cǐcì zāinàn zhīhòu，tā wúyí jiāng xiàtái。
此次灾难之后，他无疑将下台。
Despite all his brave words, even he could not be prepared against a disaster.
Jǐnguǎn tā háoyánzhuàngyǔ，dàn tā hái méiyǒu wèi kàngzhēng zāinàn zuòhǎo zhǔnbèi。
尽管他豪言壮语，但他还没有为抗争灾难做好准备。
Most people fail to recover from financial disasters.
Dàduōshù rén méi néng cóng jīnróng zāinàn zhōng huīfù guòlái。
大多数人没能从金融灾难中恢复过来。
Planning needs to take account of the worst possible disaster.
Jìhuà bìxū kǎolǜ dào kěnéng chūxiàn de zuì zāogāo de zāinàn。
计划必须考虑到可能出现的最糟糕的灾难。
The whole city was affected by the irremediable calamity.
Zhěnggè chéngshì dōu shòudàole zhècì wúfǎ bǔjiù de jùdà zāinàn de yǐngxiǎng。
整个城市都受到了这次无法补救的巨大灾难的影响。
The power failure caused a refrigerator melt that was a disaster.
Duàndiàn dǎozhì lěngcángkù rónghuà，zhè zhēnshì yì chǎng zāinàn。
断电导致冷藏库融化，这真是一场灾难。
Lack of funds has resulted in a catastrophe for our school system.
Zījīn de quēfá gěi wǒmen xuéxiào dàiláile zāinànxìng de hòuguǒ。
资金的缺乏给我们学校带来了灾难性的后果。
The candidate carefully timed his appearance at the disaster scene.
Zhè míng hòuxuǎnrén zǐxì ānpái tā zài zāinàn xiànchǎng lòumiàn de shíjiān。
这名候选人仔细安排他在灾难现场露面的时间。
Catastrophes make good copy.
Zāinàn tígōngle hěnhǎo de xīnwén bàodǎo sùcái。
灾难提供了很好的新闻报导素材。
The theatrical notion of disguise is associated with disaster in his stories.
Guānyú wěizhuāng de kuāzhāng xiǎngfǎ yǔ tā shēnghuó zhōng de zāinàn yǒuguān。
关于伪装的夸张想法与他生活中的灾难有关。
It led to a train of disasters.
Nà dǎozhìle yìliánchuàn zāinàn。
那导致了一连串灾难。
In the wake of the accident no one knew how many had been injured.
Zāinàn fāshēng hòu，méi rén zhīdào duōshǎo rén shòushāng。
灾难发生后，没人知道多少人受伤。
His policies were a disaster.
Tā de zhèngcè shì yì chǎng zāinàn。
他的政策是一场灾难。
The earthquake was a disaster.
Zhècì dìzhèn shì yì chǎng zāinàn。
这次地震是一场灾难。
A mistake that could easily have ended in disaster.
Yí xiàng hěn róngyì dǎozhì zāinàn de cuòwù。
一项很容易导致灾难的错误。
The situation slid inescapably toward disaster.
Nà zhǒng xíngshì háowú bìmiǎn de zhuǎnwéi zāinàn。
那种形势毫无避免地转为灾难。
The contracting of a serious illness can be financially catastrophic.
Huàn shàng yánzhòng jíbìng hěn kěnéng huì shì yì chǎng jīngjì zāinàn。
换上严重疾病很可能会是一场经济灾难。
He prophetically anticipated the disaster.
Tā xiānzhī bān de yùliào dàole zhè chǎng zāinàn de fāshēng。
他先知般地预料到了这场灾难的发生。
There is mischief afoot.
Yì chǎng zāinàn yǐjīng bù yuǎn le。
一场灾难已经不远了。
Organizationally, the conference was a disaster!
Cóng zǔzhī fāngmiàn láishuō，zhècì dàhuì jiǎnzhí jiùshì yìzhǒng zāinàn。
从组织方面来说，这次大会简直就是一种灾难。
Ecologically speaking, this idea is brilliant; economically, it is a disaster.
Cóng shēngtàixué de jiǎodù láishuō，zhège xiǎngfǎ hěn búcuò；ér cóng jīngjìxué de jiǎodù láishuō，zhè què shì yígè zāinàn。
从生态学的角度来说，这个想法很不错；而从经济学的角度来说，这却是一个灾难。
Ill-considered actions often result in disaster.
Lǔmǎng de xíngwéi chángcháng dǎozhì zāinànxìng hòuguǒ。
鲁莽的行为常常导致灾难性后果。
China\'s final day of reckoning is probably 10 years away.

中国距离最后的灾难时刻可能还有十年时间。

Bēnzǒuhūháo，wèi zāimín mùkuǎn。

赈济灾民
zhènjì zāimín 
relieve the people in stricken areas; aid the victims of natural calamities
水灾后，灾民们靠代食品充饥。

After the flood, the victims allayed their hunger with food substitute.
灾民越聚越多，呼饥号寒，其状甚惨。
Zāimín yuè jù yuè duō，hūjī háohán，qízhuàng shèncǎn。
The refugees population increased.  They groaned and cried because of starvation, presenting a miserable scene.
他经常匡济灾民，是一位有名的慈善家。
Tā jīngcháng kuāngjì zāimín，shì yíwèi yǒumíng de císhànjiā。
He is a famous man of charity and always assists disaster victims.
这些批拨下来的救灾物资，一定要分发到灾民手中。
Zhèxiē pībō xiàlái de jiùzāi wùzī，yídìng yào fēnfādào zāimín shǒu zhōng。

一个国家需要贮备大量的粮食，以供灾难时分发给灾民。

A country should have a large amount of grain in reserve to distribute to victims of natural disasters.
贮量决定了能分发给灾民的粮食的数量。

jiùjì zāimín
provide relief to disaster victims

fǔwèi zāiqū rénmín

jiùjì zāiqū rénmín
provide relief to the people in a disaster area
政府给遭灾的农民发了救济金。

The government sent out relief funds to farmers in the disaster-stricken area.
政府平粜粮食，是为了稳定灾区粮价，使灾区人民受益。
Zhèngfǔ píngtiào liángshí，shì wèi le wěndìng zāiqū liángjià，shǐ zāiqū rénmín shòuyì。
The government sells the grain stored in public granaries at fair prices in famine years to stabilize the grain price in the disaster area and benefit the people there.
清河给沿岸人民带来的灾难世代延传。

The Qinghe River has brought generations of disasters to the people living along its banks.
每年的水旱灾害都会给农民带来不可估量的损失。

The flood and drought each year brought incalculable damage to farmers.
面对自然灾害，我们的人民子弟兵总冲在抢险的第一线。

During natural disasters, our people\'s army always rushes to the forefront to deal with the emergency.

After the fire, everything was in a pitiable state.

灾情过后，病毒在灾区滋蔓。
Zāiqíng guòhòu，bìngdú zài zāiqū zīmàn。
After the natural disaster passed, viruses began to spread in the areas it had affected.
处理火灾的善后问题
chǔlǐ huǒzāi de shànhòu wèntí
deal with the aftermath of the fire
地震发生后，灾区群众住进了临时的防震棚。
Dìzhèn fāshēng hòu，zāiqū qúnzhòng zhù jìn le línshí de fángzhènpéng。
People living in the disaster area moved into temporary earthquake shelters after the earthquake.
洪灾爆发后战士们奔赴抗洪第一线救险。
Hóngzāi bàofā hòu zhànshìmen bēnfù kànghóng dìyī xiàn jiùxiǎn。

灾难性的后果
zāinànxìng de hòuguǒ
disastrous consequences
救援物资将在十分钟后运抵灾区。
Jiùyuán wùzī jiāng zài shí fēn zhōng hòu yùndǐ zāiqū。
Material aids will arrive at the disaster area in ten minutes.
大家都争先恐后地捐钱给灾区群众。

People are vying with each other to present money to those living in the disaster area.
洪水过后，他积极参加放赈救灾工作。

灾情过后的反应很及时。

抵御自然灾害
dǐyù zìrán zāihài 
withstand natural calamities
水旱灾害接踵而来。
Shuǐ hàn zāihài jiēzhǒnɡ ér lái。
Flood and drought came one after the other.
兴修水利，免除水旱灾害
Xīngxiū shuǐlì，miǎnchú shuǐ hàn zāihài
build irrigation works to prevent droughts and floods
战胜自然灾害
zhànshèngzìrán zāihài 
conquer natural disasters
为解决洪涝灾害、干旱缺水等问题，政府需要再修建一个泵站。
Wèi jiějué hónglào zāihài、gānhàn quēshuǐ děng wèntí，zhèngfǔ xūyào zài xiūjiàn yígè bèngzhàn。
In order to deal with water issues resulted from floods and droughts, the government need to build one more pumping station.
长期的滥砍滥伐会造成严重的地质灾害。
Chángqī de lànkǎn lànfá huì zàochéng yánzhòng de dìzhì zāihài。
Illegal felling of trees for a long time will cause serious geological disasters.
今年的洪涝灾害，造成粮食颗粒无收。
Jīnnián de hónglào zāihài，zàochéng liángshí kēlì wúshōu。
This year\'s waterlog disaster made the crop unharvestable.
这个地区因常年自然灾害，土地瘠瘦，寸草不生。
Zhège dìqū yīn chángnián zìrán zāihài，tǔdì jíshòu，cùncǎo bùshēng。
Land in this area is barren and no plant can grow here, because there are natural disasters throughout the entire year.
我要把地震灾害的具体情况启奏皇上。
Wǒ yào bǎ dìzhèn zāihài de jùtǐ qíngkuàng qǐzòu huángshàng。
I am going to report to the emperor on the specific situation of the earthquake.

Měinián de shuǐhàn zāihài dōuhuì gěi nóngmín dàilái bùkě gūliàng de sǔnshī。
The flood and drought each year brought incalculable damage to farmers.

除害防灾
Many people are killed each year from natural disasters in Southern China.
在中国南方，每年都有很多人会被自然灾害夺去生命。
All of us will eventually die from disease, natural disaster, accidents or whatever.
Wǒmen zuìzhōng dūhuì sǐyú jíbìng、 zìrán zāihài、 shìgù děngděng。
我们最终都会死于疾病、自然灾害、事故等等。
Most countries of the world have records of the great natural catastrophes that have occurred.
Shìjiè shàng dàduōshù guójiā dōuyǒu yǐjīng fāshēng de zhòngdà zìrán zāihài de jìzǎi。
世界上大多数国家都有已经发生的重大自然灾害的记载。
Natural disasters are usually referred to acts of God.
Zìrán zāihài tōngcháng shì bùkěkàngjù de。
自然灾害通常是不可抗拒的。
the adverse effects of a drought
旱灾的害处
What will the government do to improve the lot quality of the fire victims?
政府打算采取何种措施来挽回火灾受害者的遭际？
to be a health/fire hazard
健康/火灾上的危害

yìcháng dàzāi

人们似乎没有从这场灾难中汲取教训。
He averted a disaster with a simple lie.
Tā yòng yí gè jiǎndān de huǎngyán jiù bìmiǎnle yì chǎng zāinàn。
他用一个简单的谎言就避免了一场灾难。

Tāmen zài móuhuà dàigěi wǒmen yì chǎng zāinàn ma？

The power failure caused a refrigerator melt that was a disaster.

断电导致冷藏库融化，这真是一场灾难。
The candidate carefully timed his appearance at the disaster scene.
Zhè míng hòuxuǎnrén zǐxì ānpái tā zài zāinàn xiànchǎng lòumiàn de shíjiān。
这名候选人仔细安排他在灾难现场露面的时间。
His policies were a disaster.

他的政策是一场灾难。
The earthquake was a disaster.

He prophetically anticipated the disaster.
Tā xiānzhī bān de yùliào dàole zhè chǎng zāinàn de fāshēng。
他先知般地预料到了这场灾难的发生。
There is mischief afoot.

The firefighters attended upon a dangerous fire in the factory.

消防战士们正在工厂里对付一场危险的火灾。
The first calamity was a disastrous trade war with Holland.

第一次灾难性的事件即是同荷兰之间的一场贸易战。
家庭的灾变并没有使他丧失生活的勇气。
Jiātíng de zāibiàn bìng méiyǒu shǐ tā sàngshī shēnghuó de yǒngqì。
The sudden change in the family didn\'t make him lose his lust for life.

他家发生了火灾，这真是飞灾横祸啊。

A fire broke out in his house, a really unexpected disaster.
这些批拨下来的救灾物资，一定要分发到灾民手中。

Make sure to distribute these disaster relief materials to the hands of the victims.
政府平粜粮食，是为了稳定灾区粮价，使灾区人民受益。
Zhèngfǔ píngtiào liángshí，shì wèi le wěndìng zāiqū liángjià，shǐ zāiqū rénmín shòuyì。
The government sells the grain stored in public granaries at fair prices in famine years to stabilize the grain price in the disaster area and benefit the people there.
由于灾情的恶化，政府向灾区增调两千名官兵。
Yóuyú zāiqíng de èhuà，zhèngfǔ xiàng zāiqū zēngdiào liǎng qiān míng guānbīng。
Due to the worsening of the conditions, the government throws 2000 more soldiers to the disaster area.
一个国家需要贮备大量的粮食，以供灾难时分发给灾民。
Yígè guójiā xūyào zhùbèi dàliàng de liángshi，yǐ gòng zāinàn shífēn fāgěi zāimín。
A country should have a large amount of grain in reserve to distribute to victims of natural disasters.
灾情过后，病毒在灾区滋蔓。

jiùzāi

幸灾乐祸
xìngzāilèhuò
take pleasure in (or gloat over) other people\'s misfortune
小心暗火，谨防火灾！
Xiǎoxīn ànhuǒ，jǐnfáng huǒzāi！

Huǒzāi guòhòu de xiànchǎng，kànshàngqù jǐng xiàng bēiqī。
After the fire, everything was in a pitiable state.
为解决洪涝灾害、干旱缺水等问题，政府需要再修建一个泵站。

In order to deal with water issues resulted from floods and droughts, the government need to build one more pumping station.
为了躲避兵灾，他们全家来到了乡下。
Wèile duǒbì bīngzāi，tāmen quánjiā láidào le xiāngxià。
The whole family moved to the countryside to avoid the disaster caused by war.
她被报社派去灾区采写新闻。
Tā bèi bàoshè pàiqù zāiqū cǎixiě xīnwén。
She was sent to the disaster area to cover interviews and reports.
超采地下水会给子孙后代造成灾难性后果。
Chāocǎi dìxiashuǐ huì gěi zǐsūn hòudài zàochéng zāinánxìng hòuguǒ。
Over exploiting underground water would bring disastrous conscequences to our children.
我们要帮助群众尽快撤出受灾区域。
Wǒmen yào bāngzhù qúnzhòng jìnkuài chèchū shòuzāi qūyù。
We must help people leave the disaster area.
人们相信鸱吻可以辟除火灾。
Rénmen xiāngxìn chīwěn kěyǐ bìchú huǒzāi。
People believe that ceramic decorations shaped like owl\'s tails are helpful to exorcise fire.
该地区发生地震灾情，国家领导驰电慰问。
Gāi dìqū fāshēng dìzhèn zāiqíng，guójiā lǐngdǎo chídiàn wèiwèn。
An earthquake struck that district.  The Chinese leaders hurriedly sent a cable to express their sympathy, and solicitude to people there.
防治稻螟是今年农业减灾的中心任务。
Fángzhì dàomíng shì jīnnián nóngyè jiǎnzāi de zhōng xīn rènwù。
Eradicating and controlling caterpillars is the central task of this year\'s disaster-reduction work.
委员会决定把这笔资金等量发放给灾区的各个农户。
Wěiyuánhuì juédìng bǎ zhè bǐ zījīn děngliàng fāfàng gěi zāiqū de gègè nónghù。
The committee decided to share the capital among the farmers in the disaster-stricken area.
长期的滥砍滥伐会造成严重的地质灾害。
Chángqī de lànkǎn lànfá huì zàochéng yánzhòng de dìzhì zāihài。
Illegal felling of trees for a long time will cause serious geological disasters.
加强冬防，杜绝火灾。
Jiāqiáng dōngfáng，dùjué huǒzāi。
In winter, measures should be taken to prevent fires from breaking out.
由于旱灾，有不少田地断垄了。
Yóuyú hànzāi，yǒu bùshǎo tiándì duànlǒng le。
Due to the drought, much of the of farmland is without seedlings.
地震发生后，灾区群众住进了临时的防震棚。
Dìzhèn fāshēng hòu，zāiqū qúnzhòng zhù jìn le línshí de fángzhènpéng。
People living in the disaster area moved into temporary earthquake shelters after the earthquake.
洪水过后，他积极参加放赈救灾工作。
Hóngshuǐ guò hòu，tā jījí cānjiā fàngzhèn jiùzāi gōngzuò。
He actively participated in helping  the victims of the flood and the relief distribution work in the disaster-stricken area.
军民团结一致，奋击洪灾。
Jūnmín tuánjié yízhì，fènjī hóngzāi。
The army and the local people worked together to fight against the flood.
传说中旱魃是引起旱灾的怪物。
Chuánshuō zhōng hànbá shì yǐnqǐ hànzāi de guàiwù。
It is said that demon of drought caused the drought.
今年的洪涝灾害，造成粮食颗粒无收。
Jīnnián de hónglào zāihài，zàochéng liángshí kēlì wúshōu。
This year\'s waterlog disaster made the crop unharvestable.
灾民越聚越多，呼饥号寒，其状甚惨。
Zāimín yuè jù yuè duō，hūjī háohán，qízhuàng shèncǎn。
The refugees population increased.  They groaned and cried because of starvation, presenting a miserable scene.
他虎视着那个险些给他带来灾难的人。
Tā hǔshì zhe nàge xiǎnxiē gěi tā dàilái zāinán de rén。
He stared angrily at the people who nearly brought disaster to him.
华南地区最近普降暴雨，灾情严重。
Huánán dìqū zuìjìn pǔjiàng bàoyǔ，zāiqíng yánzhòng。
Recently, areas in South China are generally suffering from rainstorms, and the situation is very serious.
这张画符可以用来消灾免难。
Zhèzhāng huàfú kěyǐ yònglái xiāozāi miǎnnàn。
This talisman can block off disasters, and evil things.
在火药库附近没有及时熄灭烟火，就留下了祸种，随时会引起火灾。
Zài huǒyàokù fùjìn méiyǒu jíshí xīmiè yānhuǒ，jiù liúxià le huòzhǒng，suíshí huì yǐnqǐ huǒzāi。
Those unextinguished butts near the powder magazine could cause a fire at any time.
这个地区因常年自然灾害，土地瘠瘦，寸草不生。
Zhège dìqū yīn chángnián zìrán zāihài，tǔdì jíshòu，cùncǎo bùshēng。
Land in this area is barren and no plant can grow here, because there are natural disasters throughout the entire year.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
不少人想依靠烧香拜佛来消灾解难。
Bùshǎorén xiǎng yīkào shāoxiāng bàifó lái xiāozāijiěnàn。
Many people want to relieve their worries and difficulties by burning incense and praying to Buddha.
这列火车解运的是救灾粮。
Zhè liè huǒchē jièyùn de shì jiùzāiliáng。
This train delivers food to disaster-stricken areas.
政府给遭灾的农民发了救济金。
Zhèngfǔ gěi zāozāi de nóngmín fā le jiùjìjīn。
The government sent out relief funds to farmers in the disaster-stricken area.
洪灾爆发后战士们奔赴抗洪第一线救险。
Hóngzāi bàofā hòu zhànshìmen bēnfù kànghóng dìyī xiàn jiùxiǎn。
The soldiers went to the flood-stricken areas to control the flood.
经实地勘查，火灾原因已初步探明。
Jīng shídì kānchá，huǒzāi yuányīn yǐ chūbùtànmíng。
After the field investigations, the cause of the fire has been preliminarily verified.
在洪汛期到来之前，大家早已做好了抗涝减灾准备。
Zài hóngxùnqī dàolái zhīqián，dàjiā zǎoyǐ zuòhǎo le kànglào jiǎnzāi zhǔnbèi。
Before the arrival of the flood season, everybody was ready to fight floods and reduce damage.
海啸之后，人们准备刻石纪念这次灾难的受害者。
Hǎixiào zhīhòu，rénmen zhǔnbèi kèshí jìniàn zhècì zāinàn de shòuhàizhě。
People plan to carve a stone to memorialize the tsunami victims.
奶奶说她小时村里遭过一次大灾，大家都不得不靠啃青度日。
Nǎinai shuō tā xiǎoshí cūn lǐ zāoguò yícì dàzāi，dàjiā dōu bùdébùkào kěnqīng dùrì。
Grandma said that when she was young, her village was once struck by calamity, and villagers had to eat unripe crops.
这片枯草还是及时烧掉，以免不小心造成火灾！
Zhè piàn kūcǎo háishi jíshí shāodiào，yǐmiǎn bùxiǎoxīn zàochéng huǒzāi！
This stretch of withered grass should be burned, or it may cause a fire.
他经常匡济灾民，是一位有名的慈善家。
Tā jīngcháng kuāngjì zāimín，shì yíwèi yǒumíng de císhànjiā。
He is a famous man of charity and always assists disaster victims.
这次蝗灾来势汹汹，治理起来难度很大！
Zhècì huángzāi láishì xiōngxiōng，zhìlǐ qǐlái nándù hěndà！
The plague of locusts is fierce and is hard to control and eradicate.
他所遭受的缧绁之灾对于他的家庭来说真是难以承受。
Tā suǒ zāoshòu de léixiè zhī zāi duìyú tā de jiātíng láishuō zhēnshì nányǐ chéngshòu。
The disaster of his being put into prision was unbearable to his family.
多亏了邻人相救，他才能在火灾中逃生。
Duōkuī le línrén xiāngjiù，tā cáinéng zài huǒzāi zhōng táoshēng。
It was due to the help of his neighbours that he managed to survive the fire.
他在家中贴上了灵符，希望可以避除灾祸。
Tā zài jiā zhōng tiēshàng le língfú，xīwàng kěyǐ bìchú zāihuò。
He affixed spiritual magic figures in his home in hope of warding off disasters.
这次火灾使得秘府中的古籍损失过半。
Zhècì huǒzāi shǐdé mìfǔ zhōng de gǔjí sǔnshī guòbàn。
The fire destroyed more than half of the ancient books in the secret repository.
听说家乡今年闹灾了，他赶快给家里寄了些钱。
Tīngshuō jiā xiàng jīnnián nàozāi le，tā gǎnkuài gěi jiā lǐ jì le xiē qián。
He remitted some money home when he heard that there had been a calamity in his hometown.
我要把地震灾害的具体情况启奏皇上。
Wǒ yào bǎ dìzhèn zāihài de jùtǐ qíngkuàng qǐzòu huángshàng。
I am going to report to the emperor on the specific situation of the earthquake.
灾荒年月，饿死的黔首成千上万。
Zāihuāng niányuè，èsǐ de qiánshǒu chéngqiān shàngwàn。
In these famine years, tens of thousands of common people starved to death.
今年庄稼遭了虫灾，肯定是个歉岁了。
Jīnnián zhuāngjià zāo le chóngzāi，kěndìng shì gè qiànsuì le。
The crops suffered from insect plague this year, it will definitely be a lean year.
直到救援物资到达，灾区的群众已经缺食近一个月了。
Zhídào jiùyuán wùzī dàodá，zāiqū de qúnzhòng yǐjing quēshí jìn yígèyuè le。
By the time relief arrived, the people in the disaster area had already suffered from insufficient food for a month.
植树造林可以有效地防治沙灾。
Zhíshù zàolín kěyǐ yǒuxiào de fángzhì shāzāi。
Tree planting, and forestation can effectively prevent sandstorms.
每年的水旱灾害都会给农民带来不可估量的损失。
Měinián de shuǐhàn zāihài dōuhuì gěi nóngmín dàilái bùkě gūliàng de sǔnshī。
The flood and drought each year brought incalculable damage to farmers.
正因为水火无情，所以人们都应提高防灾意识。
Zhèng yīnwèi shuǐhuǒ wúqíng，suǒyǐ rénmen dōu yīng tígāo fángzāi yìshí。
Since fire and water have no mercy people should be alert for disasters.
他在这次火灾中死里逃生，但是体表被大面积烧伤。
Tā zài zhècì huǒzāi zhōng sǐlǐ táoshēng，dànshì tǐbiǎo bèi dàmiànjī shāoshāng。
He had a narrow escape from the fire, but the surface of his skin was severely burned.
他的命真苦，遭遇了这样的天灾人祸。
Tā de mìng zhēn kǔ，zāoyù le zhèyàng de tiānzāi rénhuò。
He\'s got a bad lot, to be struck by such calamities.
冬天风干物燥，必须小心管理香火，否则易引发火灾。
Dōngtiān fēnggān wùzào，bìxū xiǎoxīn guǎnlǐ xiānghuǒ，fǒuzé yì yǐnfā huǒzāi。
It is dry in winter, you must take charge of the burning joss sticks and watch out for fire.
今年遭天灾又遇人祸，真是一个凶年。
Jīnnián zāo tiānzāi yòu yù rénhuò，zhēnshì yígè xiōngnián。
There have been natural and man-made calamities this year. It is really a bad year.
雪灾使学生不能正常上课。
Xuězāi shǐ xuésheng bùnéng zhèngcháng shàngkè。
The snowstorm stops students from going to class as usual.
今年是百年未遇的灾年，各地的义仓都在放粮。
Jīnnián shì bǎinián wèiyù de zāinián，gè dì de yìcāng dōu zài fàngliáng。
This year is a famine year not seen in a hundred years, all public granaries are distributing grains of rice.
阴阳先生说他印堂发黑会有大灾，可他一点不信。
Yīnyáng xiānshēng shuō tā yìntáng fāhēi huìyǒu dàzāi，kě tā yìdiǎn bùxìn。
The fortune-teller said that the space between his eyebrows appeared black, and that he would have a big disaster; however, he didn\'t believe that at all.
救援物资将在十分钟后运抵灾区。
Jiùyuán wùzī jiāng zài shí fēn zhōng hòu yùndǐ zāiqū。
Material aids will arrive at the disaster area in ten minutes.
家庭的灾变并没有使他丧失生活的勇气。
Jiātíng de zāibiàn bìng méiyǒu shǐ tā sàngshī shēnghuó de yǒngqì。
The sudden change in the family didn\'t make him lose his lust for life.
这个地方很少受灾殃，看来很适合人类生存。
Zhège dìfāng hěnshǎo shòu zāiyāng，kànlái hěn shìhé rénlèi shēngcún。
Natual disasters rarely happen here, so this place is quite suitable for habitation.
这次灾异造成了很大的人员伤亡。
Zhècì zāiyì zàochéng le hěndà de rényuán shāngwáng。
This disaster has caused heavy casualities.
这火灾被认定为是责任事故。
Zhè huǒzāi bèi rèndìngwéi shì zérèn shìgù。
This fire was determined to be an accident caused by negligence.
他招灾后，别的亲戚都不和他来往了。
Tā zhāozāi hòu，bié de qīnqi dōu bùhé tā láiwǎng le。
After bringing about disaster, all the other relatives stopped contacting him.
为了尽快搞清楚前面的灾情，抗洪部队发射了很多照明弹。
Wèile jǐnkuài gǎo qīngchu qiánmiàn de zāiqíng，kànghóng bùduì fāshè le hěnduō zhàomíngdàn。
In order to figure out the situation of the disaster in front, the troops fighting the flood have launched several flares.
大家都争先恐后地捐钱给灾区群众。
Dàjiā dōu zhēngxiān kǒnghòu dì juānqián gěi zāiqū qúnzhòng。
People are vying with each other to present money to those living in the disaster area.
百年不遇的洪水，使这个村庄遭受了重灾。
Bǎiniánbúyù de hóngshuǐ，shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng zāoshòu le zhòngzāi。
A flood, the likes of which have not been seen in a hundred years, has devastated this village.
贮量决定了能分发给灾民的粮食的数量。
Zhùliàng juédìng le néng fēnfā gěi zāimín de liángshi de shùliàng。
The volume of storage determines the possible amount of grain distributed to victims.
大概又发生火灾了，消防车像风一样疾驰而过。
Dàgài yòu fāshēng huǒzāi le，xiāofángchē xiàng fēng yíyàng jíchí érguò。
A fire has broken out somewhere, a fire engine rushes by.
面对自然灾害，我们的人民子弟兵总冲在抢险的第一线。
Miànduì zìrán zāihài，wǒmen de rénmín zǐdìbīng zǒng chōng zài qiǎngxiǎn de dìyī xiàn。
During natural disasters, our people\'s army always rushes to the forefront to deal with the emergency.

zāihuòde gēndǐ

Zhèchǎng huǒzāide sǔnshī nányǐgūliàng。
It\'ll be hard to measure the damage caused by the fire.

Hàoqí yǒushí huì yǐnzhì zāihuò。
Curiosity can sometimes lead to disaster.

灾区生活用品极为匮乏。
Zāiqū shēnghuóyòngpǐn jíwéi kuìfá.
The disaster area is very low in basic necessities.
幸灾乐祸
xìngzāilèhuò
take pleasure in the misfortunes of others
连年闹水灾
liánnián nào shuǐzāi

一起火灾
yìqǐ huǒzāi
a fire
这起火灾是由于煤气泄漏引起的。
Zhèqǐ huǒzāi shì yóuyú méiqì xièlòu yǐnqǐ de。
This fire was caused by a gas leak.
看到他家破人亡，她却幸灾乐祸地笑了。
Kàndào tā jiāpò-rénwáng，tā què xìngzāilèhuò de xiàole。
When she saw that his family was ruined, she gloated at his misfortune.
他在抗洪救灾中不幸殉难。
Tā zài kànghóngjiùzāi zhōng búxìng xùnnàn。
Sadly, he died fighting the floods.
一旦发生核战争，整个地球将会陷入灾难。
Yídàn fāshēng hézhànzhēng，zhěnggè dìqiú jiānghuì xiànrù zāinàn。
If atomic war were to break out, it would be disastrous for the whole world.
义卖所得钱款已全部寄往灾区。
Yìmài suǒdé qiánkuǎn yǐ quánbù jìwǎng zāiqū。
All money raised from this charity sale has already been sent to the disaster area.

火灾刚发生时，我们就都疏散出去了。

I can\'t determine what exactly caused the fire.
我无法断定究竟是什么引起的火灾。

the disaster fund

yīn zāo tiānzāi ér qiànshōu

zāoshòu tiānzāi 
suffer natural disasters

shuǐzāiqū
flooded area

zāoshòu shuǐzāi
be hit by floods

水旱灾害接踵而来。
Shuǐ hàn zāihài jiēzhǒnɡ ér lái。
Flood and drought came one after the other.
兴修水利，免除水旱灾害
Xīngxiū shuǐlì，miǎnchú shuǐ hàn zāihài
build irrigation works to prevent droughts and floods
每年的水旱灾害都会给农民带来不可估量的损失。
Měinián de shuǐhàn zāihài dōuhuì gěi nóngmín dàilái bùkě gūliàng de sǔnshī。
The flood and drought each year brought incalculable damage to farmers.
江水决堤，泛滥成灾。
Jiāngshuǐ juédī, fànlànchéngzāi。
The river overflowed its banks and caused serious flooding.
为解决洪涝灾害、干旱缺水等问题，政府需要再修建一个泵站。
Wèi jiějué hónglào zāihài、gānhàn quēshuǐ děng wèntí，zhèngfǔ xūyào zài xiūjiàn yígè bèngzhàn。
In order to deal with water issues resulted from floods and droughts, the government need to build one more pumping station.
超采地下水会给子孙后代造成灾难性后果。
Chāocǎi dìxiashuǐ huì gěi zǐsūn hòudài zàochéng zāinánxìng hòuguǒ。
Over exploiting underground water would bring disastrous conscequences to our children.
百年不遇的洪水，使这个村庄遭受了重灾。
Bǎiniánbúyù de hóngshuǐ，shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng zāoshòu le zhòngzāi。
A flood, the likes of which have not been seen in a hundred years, has devastated this village.
洪水过后，他积极参加放赈救灾工作。
Hóngshuǐ guò hòu，tā jījí cānjiā fàngzhèn jiùzāi gōngzuò。
He actively participated in helping  the victims of the flood and the relief distribution work in the disaster-stricken area.
正因为水火无情，所以人们都应提高防灾意识。
Zhèng yīnwèi shuǐhuǒ wúqíng，suǒyǐ rénmen dōu yīng tígāo fángzāi yìshí。
Since fire and water have no mercy people should be alert for disasters.
水灾。
罕见的水灾。
水灾的痕迹还没完全消除。
躲过水灾，又遇火险。
水涝灾害。

a town hard hit by floods
严重遭受水灾的城镇
floods resulting from heavy rains
大雨引起的水灾
heavy rains resulting in floods
造成水灾的大雨
nor flood nor fire
既不是洪水又不是火灾
ruinous floods
灾难性的洪水
The flood caused extensive damage to the crops.
Hóngshuǐ dǎozhì dàliàng zuòwù shòuzāi。
洪水导致大量作物受灾。
The flood was disastrous to the economy.
Hóngshuǐ duì jīngjì de zuòyòng shì zāinànxìng de。
洪水对经济的作用是灾难性的。

miǎn yú shòuzāi

受灾地区
shòuzāi dìqū
disaster area; stricken (or afflicted, affected) area

Wǒmen yào bāngzhù qúnzhòng jìnkuài chèchū shòuzāi qūyù。
We must help people leave the disaster area.
这个地方很少受灾殃，看来很适合人类生存。
Zhège dìfāng hěnshǎo shòu zāiyāng，kànlái hěn shìhé rénlèi shēngcún。
Natual disasters rarely happen here, so this place is quite suitable for habitation.

Zāoshòu shuǐzāi
be hit by floods
百年不遇的洪水，使这个村庄遭受了重灾。
Bǎiniánbúyù de hóngshuǐ，shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng zāoshòu le zhòngzāi。
A flood, the likes of which have not been seen in a hundred years, has devastated this village.
他所遭受的缧绁之灾对于他的家庭来说真是难以承受。
Tā suǒ zāoshòu de léixiè zhī zāi duìyú tā de jiātíng láishuō zhēnshì nányǐ chéngshòu。
The disaster of his being put into prision was unbearable to his family.
海啸之后，人们准备刻石纪念这次灾难的受害者。
Hǎixiào zhīhòu，rénmen zhǔnbèi kèshí jìniàn zhècì zāinàn de shòuhàizhě。
People plan to carve a stone to memorialize the tsunami victims.
政府平粜粮食，是为了稳定灾区粮价，使灾区人民受益。
Zhèngfǔ píngtiào liángshí，shì wèi le wěndìng zāiqū liángjià，shǐ zāiqū rénmín shòuyì。
The government sells the grain stored in public granaries at fair prices in famine years to stabilize the grain price in the disaster area and benefit the people there.

Eradicating and controlling caterpillars is the central task of this year\'s disaster-reduction work.

Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。

预防火灾
yùfánɡ huǒzāi 
take precautions against fire
小心暗火，谨防火灾！
Xiǎoxīn ànhuǒ，jǐnfáng huǒzāi！
Watch out for smoldering fire!
火灾过后的现场，看上去景象悲凄。
Huǒzāi guòhòu de xiànchǎng，kànshàngqù jǐng xiàng bēiqī。
After the fire, everything was in a pitiable state.
人们相信鸱吻可以辟除火灾。
Rénmen xiāngxìn chīwěn kěyǐ bìchú huǒzāi。
People believe that ceramic decorations shaped like owl\'s tails are helpful to exorcise fire.
加强冬防，杜绝火灾。
Jiāqiáng dōngfáng，dùjué huǒzāi。
In winter, measures should be taken to prevent fires from breaking out.
他家发生了火灾，这真是飞灾横祸啊。
Tā jiā fāshēng le huǒzāi，zhè zhēnshi fēizāi hénghuò a。
A fire broke out in his house, a really unexpected disaster.
在火药库附近没有及时熄灭烟火，就留下了祸种，随时会引起火灾。

Those unextinguished butts near the powder magazine could cause a fire at any time.
经实地勘查，火灾原因已初步探明。

This stretch of withered grass should be burned, or it may cause a fire.
多亏了邻人相救，他才能在火灾中逃生。

他在这次火灾中死里逃生，但是体表被大面积烧伤。

Luxun attacked feudal traditions in many of his articles.
在纪念馆里我们看到了一些鲁迅的笔札。

When high tide came in, he ran away quickly.

Jìnnián lái，wǒguó gōngnóngyè xùnměng fāzhǎn。

由于紧靠京津地区，淮海地区经济发展迅速。

他儿子长得虎势极了，身体倍儿棒。
Tā érzi zhǎng de hǔshì jí le，shēntǐ bèir bàng。
His son was strong and mighty with a very healthy body.
老虎驯顺的在笼子里睡觉呢，一点都不吓人。
Lǎohǔ xùnshùn de zài lóngzi lǐ shuìjiào ne，yìdiǎn dōu bú xiàrén。
The tiger doesn\'t look frightening at all when it is sleeping tamely in the cage.
一看到那只兔子，笼中老虎的野性立刻暴露无遗。
Yí kàndào nàzhī tùzi，lóng zhōng lǎohǔ de yěxìng lìkè bàolù wúyí。
At the sight of that rabbit, the caged tiger could not help but show its wild nature.
我们不能对孩子的教育有半点儿马虎。
Wǒmen bùnéng duì háizi de jiàoyù yǒu bàndiǎner mǎhu。
We cannot be even a little careless for children\'s education.

She gulped down some orange juice hastily.

她狼吞虎咽地吃了几个桔子。
She is a tiger when it comes to her children.

The tiger hides and then launches out at speed to catch the small prey in its teeth.

My family had been using a huge kitchen range to boil water for many years before we moved into the new house.
我们同年，都属虎。

成年虎
几个虎生生的年轻人都报名参军了。

虽说是初生牛犊不怕虎，但也要量力而行，不能莽撞。

The trainer is training the tiger to leap over obstacles.

In the ancient army, the Huben Division was very respected.
他走起路来虎步临风，矫健稳重。

He walked in powerful and vigorous steps, looking brisk and sober.
他虎步龙行，具有君王霸气。

He carries a mighty bearing, and has the air of a king.
他有虎胆却没智慧，遇到危险也只管往前冲。

虎骨作为一种中药现在已禁止使用。
Hǔgǔ zuòwéi yìzhǒng zhōng yào xiànzài yǐ jìnzhǐ shǐyòng。
Tiger bones used in Chinese medicine has been forbiddern.
这座山虎踞龙盘，危不可攀。
Zhèzuò shān hǔjù lóngpán，wēibùkěpān。
The mountain is too dangerous to climb, it is shaped like a crouching tiger and a hunkering dragon.

Zuòrén yīng duō yìxiē hǔqì，bié qièchǎng。
A person should act more brave, don\'t be timid.
球场上队员们个个虎生生的，很有气势。

All the players on the football field were energetic and powerful, looking very vigorous.
他虎视着那个险些给他带来灾难的人。

He stared angrily at the people who nearly brought disaster to him.
他儿子长得虎势极了，身体倍儿棒。
Tā érzi zhǎng de hǔshì jí le，shēntǐ bèir bàng。
His son was strong and mighty with a very healthy body.

祝你在新的一年事业有成，虎跃龙腾。

他因画虎类犬在学校成了众人的笑料。
Tā yīn huà hǔlèiquǎn zài xuéxiào chéng le zhòngrén de xiàoliào。
He became the public jape in school, because he overreached when imitating others.
这只猫非常强壮，荤似一只小老虎。

We prolonged our stay.
Wǒmen yánchángle dòuliú shíjiān。
我们延长了逗留时间。
There was an indefinite prolongation of the peace talks.
Hépíng huìtán bèi wúxiànqī de yáncháng le。
和平会谈被无限期地延长了。
Repeaters can be used in computer networks to extend cabling distances.
Zhōngjìqì kěyǐ yòng lái yáncháng jìsuànjīwǎngluò zhōng de bùxiàn jùlí。
中继器可以用来延长计算机网络中的布线距离。
The extended airport runways can accommodate larger planes.
Yáncháng hòu de jīchǎng pǎodào nénggòu shìyìng gèng dàxíng de fēijī。
延长后的机场跑道能够适应更大型的飞机。
the Appian way
阿皮亚路(古代从罗马向西南方向延伸，长约450公里的大路，其中一部分至今尚存)
The vine creeps along the wall.
树藤顺着墙蔓延生长。
The judge called for a pitcher of water, a tip-off that the session would be long.
法官要了一大杯水，这表明审判要延续很长一段时间。
The creek goes back a very long way.
Xiǎoxī xiàng hòu yánshēn hěncháng。
小溪向后延伸很长。
The medicine can stay the development of tumors.
这种药能延缓肿瘤的生长。
Instant replay caused too long a delay.
Jíshí chóngfàng zàochéngle hěn cháng shíjiān de yánwù。
即时重放造成了很长时间的延误。
A wide stair descended from the gallery into a long low hall.
Yí gè kuānkuānde lóutī cóng huàláng pū xiàlái，yánshēn jìnrù yí gè yòuchángyòudī de dàtīng lǐ。
一个宽宽的楼梯从画廊铺下来，延伸进入一个又长又低的大厅里。
They \'d already caused long delays by working to rule.
Zhàozhāng gōngzuò，tāmen yǐ zàochéng hěn cháng shíjiān de tuōyán。
他们通过怠工已造成很长时间的拖延。
I will try to stall off the reporters as long as possible.
Wǒ huì shèfǎ jìnkěnéng cháng shíjiān de tuōyán nàxiē jìzhě。
我会设法尽可能长时间地拖延那些记者。
The host has to give a long talk to spin the time out.
主持人必须讲很长一段话来拖延时间。
Our site is like a tree, ever growing, branching out into all sorts.
Wǒmen zhège dìfang jiùxiàng yì kē shù，yìzhí zài shēngzhǎng，xiàng sìmiànbāfāng yánshēn。
我们这个地方就像一棵树，一直在生长，向四面八方延伸。
Head injuries delayed the child\'s mental progress.
Tóubù de shānghài yánhuǎnle háizi xīnlǐ de chéngzhǎng。
头部的伤害延缓了孩子心理的成长。
公路向两边延展，没有尽头。
Gōnglù xiàng liǎngbiān yánzhǎn，méiyǒu jìntóu。
The road extends in both directions and looks endless.
铁路一直延伸到海边。
Tiělù yìzhí yánshēndào hǎibiɑn。
The railway line stretches right to the coast.
河边垂杨的枝叶都延伸到了河里。
Hébiān chuíyáng de zhīyè dōu yánshēn dào le hé lǐ。
The branches and leaves of the weeping willows by the river bank are stretching into the river.
This road proceeds towards the south.
这条路向南边延伸。
The street market ends near by the river.
街市一直延伸到河边。
Small hotels run all the way to the Mexican border.
小旅馆遍布沿途，一直延伸至墨西哥边界。
The route ran along the Parish boundary.
Zhè tiáo lùxiàn yánshēn dào Pàlǐshí biānjiè。
这条路线延伸到帕里什边界。
This is a land of rich fertile valleys that reach up to touch the edge of wild moorland.
Zhè shì yí gè tǔdì fùráo féiwò de shāngǔ，yánshēn dào yěshēng gāo zhǎo dì de biānyuán。
这是一个土地富饶肥沃的山谷，延伸到野生高沼地的边缘。
他们决定改道先去延安。
Tāmen juédìng gǎidào xiān qù Yán\'ān。
They decided to change their route and go to Yan\'an first.
看到这排窑洞，当年延安的光景又重现在眼前。
Kàndào zhè pái yáodòng，dāngnián Yán\'ān de guāngjǐngyòu chóngxiàn zài yǎnqián。
The sight of the caves brought back scenes of our life at Yan\'an.
他们将由西安前往延安。
Tāmen jiāngyóu Xī\'ān qiánwǎngYán\'ān。
From Xi\'an they will proceed to Yan\'an.
《延安颂》
《Yán\'ān Sòng》
Ode to Yan\'an
代表团在延安停留了一周。
Dàibiǎotuán zài Yán\'ān tíngliú le yì zhōu。
The delegation stayed in Yan\'an for a week.
延安一别，于今十年。
Yán\'ān yì bié，yújīn shínián。
It is ten years since we parted in Yan\'an.
奶奶1937年毕业于延安抗大。
Nǎinai yījiǔsānqī nián bìyè yú Yán\'ān kàngdà。
Grandma graduated from the Chinese People\'s Anti-Japanese Military and Political College in Yanan in 1937.
反恐队员安装了延爆装置，赢得了时间。
Fǎnkǒng duìyuán ānzhuāng le yánbào zhuāngzhì，yíngdé le shíjiān。
The anti-terrorist police installed a device to delay the explosion, bringing us more time.
这件事应当立即上报公安部，不容延误。
Zhèjiànshì yīngdānglìjí shàngbào gōng\'ānbù，bùróngyánwù。
This matter should be reported, without delay, to the Ministry of Public Security.
《延安纪行》。
《在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话》。
革命圣地延安。
《在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话》(简称《讲话》，下同)。
Yan\'an Road crossing Panyu Road
延安路与番禺路的交叉口
延期偿付
yánqī chángfù 
delay the payment of a debt
毫不迟延地执行命令
háo bùchíyán de zhíxíngmìnglìng
carry out orders without delay
会议大概要延期。
Huìyì dàgài yào yánqī。
The meeting will probably be postponed.
他们决定改道先去延安。
Tāmen juédìng gǎidào xiān qù Yán\'ān。
They decided to change their route and go to Yan\'an first.

The sight of the caves brought back scenes of our life at Yan\'an.
广延量
guǎngyán liàng
extensive quantity
再要推延，就会悔之无及了。
Zài yào tuīyán，jiùhuì huǐzhīwújí le。
With further delay it will be too late to repent.
延迟焦化
yánchí jiāohuà 
delayed coking
曼延曲折的羊肠小道
mànyán qūzhé de yángchángxiǎodào 
a winding footpath stretching into the distance
火势蔓延很快。
Huǒshì mànyán hěn kuài。
The fire spread quickly.
控制流行性感冒的蔓延
kòngzhì liúxíngxìnggǎnmào de mànyán。
keep flu from spreading
第二次世界大战后，局部战争一直绵延不断。
Dì Er Cì Shìjiè Dàzhàn hòu，júbùzhànzhēngyìzhí miányán búduàn。
Local wars have been going on continually ever since the end of World War II.
延长期限
yánchángqīxiàn
extend the time limit
迁延时日
qiānyánshírì
cause a long delay; become long-drawn-out

Tāmen jiāngyóu Xī\'ān qiánwǎngYán\'ān。
From Xi\'an they will proceed to Yan\'an.

Qiè wù chíyán。
Be sure not to delay.
这件事应当立即上报公安部，不容延误。
Zhèjiànshì yīngdānglìjí shàngbào gōng\'ānbù，bùróngyánwù。
This matter should be reported, without delay, to the Ministry of Public Security.
街道沿着港湾伸延。
Jiēdào yán zhe gǎngwān shēnyán。
The streets run along the bay.
现代医学延长了人的寿命。
Xiàndài yīxué yáncháng le rén de shòumìng。
Modern medicine has increased man\'s life span.
运动会定于六月四日举行，遇雨顺延。
Yùndònghuì dìng yú liù yuè sì rì jǔxíng，yù yǔ shùnyán。
The sports meet is scheduled for June 4th—subject to postponement in case of rain.

tuōyán shíjiān

yán yī

yánchánghétongqīxiàn

Huìyì yīn gù yánqī。

zìdòngyáncháng
(of a lease, etc.) be automatically extended
会议一再延期，现在总算开成了。
Huìyì yízài yánqī，xiànzài zǒngsuàn kāichéng le。
The meeting has come off at last, after being postponed again and again.
延宕
yándàng
procrastinate; delay; keep putting off
曼延
mànyán
draw out (in length); stretch
顺延
shùnyán

蔓延
mànyán

延年益寿
yánniányìshòu
(of tonics, etc.) prolong life; promise longevity
你必须毫不迟延地去执行领导的命令。
Nǐ bìxū háobùchíyán de qù zhíxíng lǐngdǎo de mìnglìng。
现在很多企业都在延伸产品链，以此提高自身的竞争力。
Xiànzài hěnduō qǐyè dōu zài yánshēn chǎnpǐnliàn，yǐ cǐ tígāo zìshēn de jìngzhēnglì。
Nowadays, many enterprises are extending their production chains to enhance their competitiveness.
河边垂杨的枝叶都延伸到了河里。
Hébiān chuíyáng de zhīyè dōu yánshēn dào le hé lǐ。
The branches and leaves of the weeping willows by the river bank are stretching into the river.
为了防止春瘟的蔓延，村子里给每家都发了药品。
Wèile fángzhǐ chūnwēn de mànyán，cūnzi lǐ gěi měi jiā dōu fā le yàopǐn。
In order to avert spring diseases, medicines are given to every family in the village.
这种绝活后继无人，很难存延了。
Zhèzhǒng juéhuó hòujìwúrén，hěnnán cúnyán le。
With no successor, this unique technique is difficult to preserve and pass on.
他早就说过要来看我，却一直俄延至今。
Tā zǎo jiù shuō guò yào lái kàn wǒ，què yìzhí éyán zhìjīn。
A long time ago he said he would come visit me but he still hasn\'t.
由于航班延误，原定明天一早的会议需改定时间。
Yóuyú hángbān yánwù，yuándìng míngtiān yìzǎo de huìyì xū gǎidìng shíjiān。
Due the flight delay, the meeting next morning needs to be rescheduled.
许多物种都在进化中相继消亡，但依然有一些物种瓜瓞绵延至今。
Xǔduō wùzhǒng dōu zài jìnhuà zhōng xiāngjì xiāowáng，dàn yīrán yǒu yìxiē wùzhǒng guādié miányán zhìjīn。
Many species died out during evolution, but there are still some of them in existence now.
我们祝贺老师龟鹤延年，健康幸福！
Wǒmen zhùhè lǎoshī guīhè yánnián，jiànkāng xìngfú！
May our teacher have a long, healthy and happy life!
不能再继续稽延了，他的病情在快速恶化。
Bùnéng zài jìxù jīyán le，tā de bìngqíng zài kuàisù èhuà。
His disease is deteriorating rapidly. It needs prompt attention.
奶奶1937年毕业于延安抗大。
Nǎinai yījiǔsānqī nián bìyè yú Yán\'ān kàngdà。
Grandma graduated from the Chinese People\'s Anti-Japanese Military and Political College in Yanan in 1937.
由于这件事情的影响，对你的提职要拖延一段时间了。
Yóuyú zhèjiàn shìqing de yǐngxiǎng，duì nǐ de tízhí yào tuōyán yíduàn shíjiān le。
Because of this matter, your promotion has to be delayed until a later date.
是什么原因使得这个工程一再推延。
Shì shénme yuányīn shǐdé zhège gōngchéng yízài tuīyán。
I\'m wondering why this project has been delayed again and again.
这个理论的推延是一个漫长的过程。
Zhège lǐlùn de tuīyán shì yígè màncháng de guòchéng。
The development of this theory has been a long process.
成亲王算得上是当时朝延里最显贵的人。
Chéngqīnwáng suàndeshàng shì dāngshí cháoyán lǐ zuì xiǎnguì de rén。
The Duke of Chengqingwang can be counted as the most prestigious person in court at that time.
小刚父亲是朝延里的显贵，好多人都来巴结他。
Xiǎo Gāng fùqīn shì cháoyán lǐ de xiǎnguì，hǎoduōrén dōu lái bājie tā。
Xiao Gang\'s father is a high official in the court, so many people try to flatter him.
反恐队员安装了延爆装置，赢得了时间。
Fǎnkǒng duìyuán ānzhuāng le yánbào zhuāngzhì，yíngdé le shíjiān。
The anti-terrorist police installed a device to delay the explosion, bringing us more time.
我们的位置在北海公园的南北延长线上。
Wǒmen de wèizhi zài běihǎi gōngyuán de nánběi yánchángxiàn shàng。
We are at the north and south extension line of the Beihai Park.
我对你的崇拜之情犹如滔滔江水延绵不绝。
Wǒ duì nǐ de chóngbài zhī qíng yóurú tāotāo jiāngshuǐ yánmián bùjué。
My admiration for you is like the flowing water which never ends.
东汉末，曹操延纳天下贤才，雄霸一方。
Dōnghàn mò,Cáo Cāo yánnà tiānxià xiáncái,xióngbà yìfāng.
At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, Cao Cao recruited a lot of talented people and set up a separatist regime.
赤壁之战，大火延烧了几天，敌军伤亡大半。
Chìbìzhīzhàn，dàhuǒ yánshāo le jǐtiān，díjūn shāngwáng dàbàn。
After the battle of Chibi a fire kept burning for days and killed a lot of the enemies.
公路向两边延展，没有尽头。
Gōnglù xiàng liǎngbiān yánzhǎn，méiyǒu jìntóu。
The road extends in both directions and looks endless.
节目演火了，估计演期要延长了。
Jiémù yǎnhuǒ le，gūjì yǎnqī yào yáncháng le。
The program is popular now, it will be extended.
处理要务要及时，延误了你能担责任吗？
Chǔlǐ yàowù yào jíshí，yánwù le nǐ néng dān zérèn ma？
Urgent business should be handled in time. If delayed, nobody can take responsibility.
多吃水果能延年益寿。
Duō chī shuǐguǒ néng yánnián yìshòu。
Eating more fruit can extend your life span.
我对您的景仰之情有若滔滔江水，绵延不绝。
Wǒ duì nín de jǐngyǎng zhī qíng yǒuruò tāotāo jiāngshuǐ，miányán bùjué。
My admiration for you is like the unceasing flow of a river.
为了延长租限，他找房东说情。
Wèile yáncháng zūxiàn，tā zhǎo fángdōng shuōqíng。
In order to extend the rent term, he went to plead with the house owner.
大火迅速蔓延到整个村落。
Dàhuǒ xùnsùmànyán dào zhěnggè cūnluò.
The fire spread quickly to the whole village.

Jùshuō shǎoshí-duōcān nénggòu yánnián-yìshòu。

靠帝国主义的卵翼苟延残喘。
太行山脉曼延千余里
山路曼延曲折。

蔓延成风。
湖水漫延到了周围农田。

思绪绵延。
迁延岁月。
却病延年。
革命圣地延安。
拖延时日。
防止时疫蔓延。
延长家用电器的寿命。
会议延期，特此通知。
这笔钱拖延了三个月才到位。
灾后要防止瘟疫蔓延。
不会无限期拖延下去。
《在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话》(简称《讲话》，下同)。
高速公路又向海滨延长了10公里。
讨论会延长10分钟。
开幕式的时间往后延迟10分钟。
抢救伤员一秒钟也不能延迟。
切勿延宕，以免坐失良机。
心绞痛要迅速诊治，不可延搁。
会议延后几天。
延缓开工。
延缓衰老。
延揽专家。
坚持体育锻炼，可以延年益寿。
延聘塾师。
如果工作需要，到了退休年龄还可以延聘一段时间。
为满足观众要求，展览会延期两天结束。
延期10天开学。
登门延请人才。
长城从山海关向西延伸到嘉峪关。
考试延时半小时。
经常锻炼身体，可以祛病延寿。
延误战机。
室外的喧闹声，延续了一个多小时。
排练延续到深夜。
延长营业时间。
全称判断的主词是周延的。
阻止病毒蔓延。
延续祖宗的香火。
There are more aggressive and less aggressive cancers.
Áizhèng yǒu mànyán jiàowéi xùnsù de，yě yǒu mànyán jiàowéi huǎnmàn de。
癌症有蔓延较为迅速的，也有蔓延较为缓慢的。

Yǎnjiǎngzhě búduàn tuōyán，yǐbiàn yánchí tóupiào。

The antique is too damaged to sell at a good price.

Special Olympics (for the handicapped)
衰朽残年
shuāixiǔ cánnián
a decrepit old age
那残疾孩子渐渐和我厮熟起来了。
Nà cánjí háizi jiànjiàn hé wǒ sīshóu qǐlái le。
The handicapped child became close to me.
肃清敌军残部
sùqīng díjūn cánbù
mop up the remnants of the enemy
凶残的奴隶主剜掉了奴隶的双眼。
Xiōngcán de núlìzhǔ wāndiào le núlì de shuāngyǎn。
The brutal slave owner gouged out the slave\'s eyes.
一抹残霞渐渐在天边消逝。
Yìmǒ cánxiá jiànjiàn zài tiānbian xiāoshì。
A few stray rosy clouds were disappearing from the horizon.
凶残成性
xiōnɡcán chénɡ xìnɡ
be cruel by nature

zhìcánrén tǐyù dàibiǎotuán 
sports team made up of the mentally-retarded
追歼残敌
zhuījiān cándí 
pursue and wipe out the remnants of the enemy forces
自相残杀的战争
zìxiāngcánshā de zhànzhēng
a fratricidal war
残暴
cánbào
cruel and ferocious; brutal; savage
残垣断壁
cányuánduànbì
broken walls
残缺
cánquē
incomplete; with parts missing
残忍
cánrěn
cruel; ruthless
他手下只有一些残兵败将。
Tā shǒu xià zhǐyǒu yìxiē cánbīng bàijiāng。
He leads a defeated army.
这本书是残次品，本纪第二已经被人撕掉了。
Zhèběnshū shì cáncìpǐn，běn jì dìèr yǐjing bèi rén sīdiào le。
This book is incomplete, and the secondary one with its second primary chronicle ripped off by someone.
他虽然拖着病残的身子，但生活起来还是那么乐观。
Tā suīrán tuō zhe bìngcán de shēnzi，dàn shēnghuó qǐlái háishì nàme lèguān。
Though suffering from both disability and illness, he remains positive towards life.
这是病残人士的专座。
Zhè shì bìngcán rénshì de zhuānzuò。
This seat is specially reserved for handicapped people.
国家领导人亲切接见了残奥会中国代表团的运动员们。
Guójiā lǐngdǎorén qīnqiè jiējiàn le cánàohuì Zhōngguó dàibiǎotuán de yùndòngyuánmen。
The top leaders of the state met the athletes from the Chinese delegation of the Paralympics.
战争结束后，原本繁华的城市已是花草残败，一片萧条。
Zhànzhēng jiéshù hòu，yuánběn fánhuá de chéngshì yǐ shì huācǎo cánbài，yí piàn xiāotiáo。
After the war, the cities were in ruins.
很多藏书家都很重视残本古籍的收藏。
Hěnduō cángshūjiā dōu hěnzhòngshì cánběn gǔjí de shōucáng。
Many book collectors highly value the collection of ancient books, even with some parts missing.
我国的很多古本文献都只剩下一些断编残简。
Wǒ guó de hěnduō gǔběn wénxiàn dōu zhǐ shèngxià yìxiē duànbiān cánjiǎn。
Many ancient texts in China are stray fragments.
这批陶瓷花瓶残次品太多，我们一定要找出问题所在。
Zhè pī táocí huāpíng cáncìpǐn tài duō，wǒmen yídìng yào zhǎochū wèntí suǒ zài。
There are many inferior porcelain vases in this batch whose causes we have to find out.
我们要乘胜追击，将残敌一网打尽。
Wǒmen yào chéngshèng zhuījī，jiāng cándí yìwǎngdǎjìn。
When close to victory, we must pursue the remaining enemies and eliminate them.
已是残冬时节，离春天到来已经不远了。
Yǐ shì cándōng shíjié，lí chūntiān dàolái yǐjing bùyuǎn le。
It is already late winter, spring isn\'t far away.
附近的农户对匪徒之残毒恨之入骨。
Fùjìn de nónghù duì fěitú zhī cándú hènzhīrùgǔ。
The thugs\' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
下面，我将向大家介绍一个清除蔬菜残毒的方法。
Xiàmiàn，wǒ jiāng xiàng dàjiā jièshào yígè qīngchú shūcài cándú de fāngfǎ。
Next, I will show you a method to remove the remaining poisons on the vegetables.
我军奋战三个月终于剿清了这附近的残匪。
Wǒ jūn fènzhàn sāngè yuè zhōng yú jiǎoqīng le zhè fùjìn de cánfěi。
After three months\' fight, our army finally eliminated the remaining thugs.
中国积极争取残疾人奥运会的主办权。
Zhōngguó jījí zhēngqǔ cánjírén àoyùnhuì de zhǔbànquán。
China is actively bidding for the right to host the Paralympic Games.
今天，全国残疾人运动会落下了帷幕。
Jīntiān，quánguó cánjírén yùndònghuì luòxià le wéimù。
Today was the end of the National Disabled Games.
老屋子里的这把太师椅已经残旧不堪。

This armchair in the old house is old and broken.
珍本残卷十分珍贵，有很高的文物价值。

Broken scrolls are very precious for their high cultural value.

The intruders\' tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
这个孩子残虐小动物，遭到了老师的批评。

The child was blamed by the teacher for mistreating small animals.
他小心翼翼地把地上的陶瓷残片清扫干净。

He carefully cleaned up the remaining pieces of porcelain on the ground.
他又来到棋盘前，对着这盘残棋发呆。
Tā yòu láidào qípán qián，duì zhe zhè pán cánqí fādāi。
He returned to the chessboard, staring at the existing game.
这件古董残损的很厉害，不会卖出好价钱的。
Zhèjiàn gǔdǒng cánsǔn de hěnlìhai，búhuì màichū hǎo jiàqián de。
The antique is too damaged to sell at a good price.
他手术后依然昏昏沉沉，估计是麻醉药的残效还没有完全消失。
Tā shǒushù hòu yīrán hūnhūnchénchén，gūjì shì mázuìyào de cánxiào hái méiyǒu wánquán xiāoshī。
He still felt dazed after the operation. The narcotic must still be effecting him.
对面高山上的残雪还没有完全消融。
Duìmiàn gāoshān shàng de cánxuě hái méiyǒu wánquán xiāoróng。
The snow on the opposite mountain hasn\'t melted yet.
他非常荣幸地担任了这次残奥会中国代表团的旗手。

饼干已经被弟弟吃完了，罐子里只剩下了一些残渣。

像他这样集残暴和可耻于一身，实在是我们社会的丑类。

A person like him who is the combination of cruelty and disgrace is really villain in our society.
雏妓这个职业是对女孩子极度的摧残。

因为杀人无数、残忍凶暴，他被判枭首。

Súhuà shuō qiānjīn yínuò，tā shì gè jiǎng xìnyòng de rén，xǔxià de nuòyán shì búhuì qīngyì gǎibiàn de。
As the saying goes, a promise is worth a thousand ounces of gold. He is a man of his word, and never breaks his promises rashly.
一呼百诺
勉强协助(许诺)
miǎnqiǎngxiézhù（xǔnuò）
give reluctant assistance (a reluctant promise)
他许诺过帮我解决困难。
Tā xǔnuòguò bāngwǒ jiějué kùnnan。
He promised that he would help me out.
许诺
xǔnuò
make a promise; promise
他的许诺不过是一纸空谈。
Tā de xǔnuò búguòshì yìzhǐ kōngtán.
His promise is just idle talk.
他曾许诺来看她，可是终究没来。
Tā céng xǔnuò lái kàn tā，kěshì zhōngjiū méi lái。
He promised to visit her, but he never came.
俗话说千金一诺，他是个讲信用的人，许下的诺言是不会轻易改变的。
Súhuà shuō qiānjīn yínuò，tā shì gè jiǎng xìnyòng de rén，xǔxià de nuòyán shì búhuì qīngyì gǎibiàn de。
As the saying goes, a promise is worth a thousand ounces of gold. He is a man of his word, and never breaks his promises rashly.
许诺
这事她曾许诺过我。
许诺之后，又后悔了。
实践了对她的许诺。
to give a person one\'s word
向某人许诺(或保证)
He promised to love her for ever.
他许诺会永远爱她。
He was assured that the contract would be fulfilled.
Tā dédàole hétong jiānghuì bèi lǚxíng de xǔnuò。
他得到了合同将会被履行的许诺。
He promises the moon, but never keeps his word.
Tā xìnkǒu xǔnuò，dàn cóngbú duìxiàn。
他信口许诺，但从不兑现。

背弃自己的诺言
bèiqì zìjǐ de nuòyán 
go back on one\'s word
履行诺言
lǚxíngnuòyán 
keep one\'s word; fulfil (or carry out) one\'s promise
难道你忘了自己的诺言吗？
Nándào nǐ wàng le zìjǐ de nuòyán ma?
Can you have forgotten your promise?
违背诺言
wéibèi nuòyán
break one\'s promise; go back on one\'s promise
他的诺言是个圈套，我可不上这个当。
Tā de nuòyán shì gè quāntào，wǒ kě bú shàng zhège dàng。
His promises are a trap and I won\'t be taken in.
实践诺言
shíjiàn nuòyán
keep one\'s word; make good one\'s promise
实现自己的诺言
shíxiàn zìjǐ de nuòyán
fulfil one\'s promises
违背自己的诺言
wéibèi zìjǐ de nuòyán 
go back on one\'s word
信守诺言
xìnshǒu nuòyán
keep a promise; be as good as one\'s word
他一贯不讲信用，要想让他履行诺言就得等到牛年马月了！
Tā yíguàn bùjiǎng xìnyòng，yào xiǎng ràng tā lǚxíng nuòyán jiù děi děngdào niúnián mǎyuè le！

As the saying goes, a promise is worth a thousand ounces of gold. He is a man of his word, and never breaks his promises rashly.
多年来，他一直恪守诺言。
Duōnián lái，tā yìzhí kèshǒu nuòyán.
He\'s kept his promise scrupulously for many years now.
诺言
信守诺言。
承兑诺言
兑现诺言
恪守诺言
你要说话算数，不能违背自己的诺言
信守诺言。
实践诺言。
严守诺言。
empty promises
虚假的诺言
to extract a promise from someone
迫使某人作出诺言
to take a promise at face value
不要把别人的诺言百分之百地当真
Hold him to his word.
要他遵守诺言。
an inviolable promise
不可违背的诺言
promises that ring false
听起来虚假的诺言
You should keep your word.
你应该信守诺言。
I\'ve never broken my promise to you, I\'m just waiting for you to come back.
我从来没有违背自己的诺言，只是一直在等你回来。
to keep a promise
履行诺言
to keep one\'s word
履行诺言
Arkoff made good his promise.
阿考夫履行了他的诺言。
to break/keep a promise (to do sth)
违背/遵守(做某事的)诺言
to give sb one\'s word
对某人许下诺言
to keep one\'s word
遵守诺言
It\'s a crime that some people don\'t carry out their promises.
那些不履行诺言的人是可耻的。
His acts constitute a departure from his promise.
他的行为背离了他的诺言。
We will stick to our obligation.
我们将坚持我们的诺言。
He is a volatile man and always breaches his promise.
他是一个反复无常的人，总是违背自己的诺言。
Keep away from that volatile guy, he often goes back on his promise.
离那个反复无常的人远点，他经常违背自己的诺言。
The primary purpose of a promise is to undertake an obligation.
Nuòyán de shǒuyào mùdì shì chéngdān zérèn。
诺言的首要目的是承担责任。
I turned my back and broke my promises.
Wǒ zhìzhībùlǐ，wéibèile nuòyán。
我置之不理，违背了诺言。
He failed to deliver on his promises.
Tā wèi néng lǚxíng zìjǐ de nuòyán。
他未能履行自己的诺言。
He has fouled up his name with bad promises.
Bù shǒu nuòyán ràng tā míngshēng bù jiā。
不守诺言让他名声不佳。
They go back on their word.
Tāmen bèiqì nuòyán。
他们背弃诺言。
They put pressure on the officials to live up to their promises.

诺诺连声
nuònuòliánshēng
keep on saying &quot;yes&quot;
俗话说千金一诺，他是个讲信用的人，许下的诺言是不会轻易改变的。
Súhuà shuō qiānjīn yínuò，tā shì gè jiǎng xìnyòng de rén，xǔxià de nuòyán shì búhuì qīngyì gǎibiàn de。
As the saying goes, a promise is worth a thousand ounces of gold. He is a man of his word, and never breaks his promises rashly.
背弃自己的诺言
bèiqì zìjǐ de nuòyán 
go back on one\'s word
中国政府承诺人民币不贬值。
Zhōngguó zhèngfǔ chéngnuò rénmínbì bùbiǎnzhí。
The Chinese government promised not to devalue Renminbi.
我无法作出肯定的承诺。
Wǒ wúfǎ zuòchū kěndìng de chéngnuò。
I can\'t make a definite promise.
履行诺言
lǚxíngnuòyán 
keep one\'s word; fulfil (or carry out) one\'s promise
勉强协助(许诺)
miǎnqiǎngxiézhù（xǔnuò）
give reluctant assistance (a reluctant promise)
难道你忘了自己的诺言吗？
Nándào nǐ wàng le zìjǐ de nuòyán ma?
Can you have forgotten your promise?
违背诺言
wéibèi nuòyán
break one\'s promise; go back on one\'s promise
他的诺言是个圈套，我可不上这个当。
Tā de nuòyán shì gè quāntào，wǒ kě bú shàng zhège dàng。
His promises are a trap and I won\'t be taken in.
重然诺
zhòng ránnuò
be serious about making and keeping a promise; stand by one\'s word
实践诺言
shíjiàn nuòyán
keep one\'s word; make good one\'s promise
实现自己的诺言
shíxiàn zìjǐ de nuòyán
fulfil one\'s promises
违背自己的诺言
wéibèi zìjǐ de nuòyán 
go back on one\'s word
信守诺言
xìnshǒu nuòyán
keep a promise; be as good as one\'s word
他许诺过帮我解决困难。
Tā xǔnuòguò bāngwǒ jiějué kùnnan。
He promised that he would help me out.

xīnrán yǔnnuò
readily consent
许诺
xǔnuò
make a promise; promise

ɡùdìnɡ(liúdònɡ) zīchǎn

元音交替可以是某种程度的母音变换。
找一个替工
zhǎo yígè tìgōng
find a substitute; get a replacement
已经派人来接替他的工作。
Yǐjīngpài rén lái jiētì tā de gōngzuò。
A new person has been appointed to take over his work.
这里的工作谁也替不了谁。
Zhèlǐ de gōngzuò shuí yě tì bu liǎo shuí。
We cannot substitute for one another in our work here.
工作和休息应交替进行。
Gōngzuò hé xiūxi yīng jiāotìjìnxíng.
One should alternate work and relaxation.
姐姐有病，妹妹去替工。
他是临时去当替工的。
用机器代替人工。
大机器生产代替了手工作业
你的工作由老王接替。
这工作三人轮流替换着。
Automation replaces human workers by machines.
Zìdònghuà yòng jīqì dàitìle gōngrén。
自动化用机器代替了工人。
workers replaced by automated equipment
被自动化设备顶替掉的工人
I am competent in consecutive interpreting related to medical and legal fields.
我可能胜任医学和法律领域的交替传译工作。

Tā zài tā xiū chǎnjià de shíhou dàitì tā de gōngzuò。
她在她修产假的时候代替她的工作。

Zhìyuànzhě kěyǐ fǔzhù，dàn bùnéng dàitì zhèngshì yuángōng。
志愿者可以辅助，但不能代替正式员工。
I took over his practice when he retired.
Tā tuìxiū hòu wǒ jiētìle tā de gōngzuò。
他退休后我接替了他的工作。

Wǒ de jiētìzhě duì wǒ de gōngzuò fēicháng liǎojiě，tā shènzhì bǐ wǒ dōu hǎo。
我的接替者对我的工作非常了解，她甚至比我都好。

Tā bèi jiǔ yuèfèn jiārù wǒmen de quánzhí yuángōng Wòlè dàitì le。

使工作与娱乐交替进行

yòng guóchǎnpǐn dàitì jìnkǒuhuò 
substitute homemade products for imported goods

酒精一种不错的石油替代品。

酸橙汁也可以作为食谱中柠檬汁的替代品。

用石油替代煤
yòngshíyóu tìdài méi 
replace coal with petroleum; substitute petroleum for coal

in kind

替补队员
tìbǔ duìyuán 
substitute (player); reserve (player)
王军替补上场后，梅开二度，又进一球。
Wáng Jūn tìbǔ shàngchǎng hòu，méikāi èrdù，yòu jìn yì qiú。
老前锋受伤了，教练只能让替补球员取而代之。

The original forward was injured – the coach had to replace him with a substitute player.
克劳德在手臂撞伤后被替补下场。

Claude had to be substituted following a clash of arms.

我想上场，不想在余下的比赛中做替补。

女性队伍由三名运动员和一名替补队员组成。
The relief pitcher got credit for a save.

那个替补投手因一次救球而受到称赞。
Our team has a strong bench.

我们球队替补人员的实力很强。
The relief pitcher closed with two runs in the second inning.
Tìbǔ tóushǒu zài dì-èr jú zhōng zhuīshàngle liǎng fēn。
替补投手在第二局中追上了两分。
他病了，我得替他去当班。
Tā bìng le，wǒ děi tì tā qù dāngbān。

他是替班。

The teacher had to substitute for her sick colleague.
老师不得不替她生病的同事代班。
我们暗地里替他高兴。
Wǒmen àndìlǐ tì tā gāoxìng。
We inwardly rejoiced for him.
她替儿子做作业，反而帮了倒忙。
Tā tì érzi zuò zuòyè，fǎn\'ér bāng le dàománg。
She did her son a disservice by doing his homework for him.
有人替他抱不平。
Yǒu rén tì tā bào bùpíng。
Some felt indignant on his behalf.

Nǐ gěi tā xiě xìn shí，tì wǒ dài yì bǐ。
Please remember me to him when you write.
我替你捎来一双鞋，望便中来取。
Wǒ tì nǐ shāolái yì shuāng xié，wàng biàn zhōng lái qǔ。
I\'ve brought you a pair of shoes. Please come for them whenever it\'s convenient.
不要替他辩护了。
Búyào tì tā biànhù le。

yòng guóchǎnpǐn dàitì jìnkǒuhuò 
substitute homemade products for imported goods

Tā bìng le，wǒ děi tì tā qù dāngbān。
He\'s ill, so I\'ve got to work his shift.

Tā zǒu le shuí lái dǐngtì tā?

shēngchǎn fāngshì de gēngtì
the replacement of one mode of production by another
请你替我过个话，就说我明天不去找他了。
Qǐngnǐ tì wǒ guò ge huà，jiù shuō wǒ míngtiān bú qù zhǎo tā le。
Would you mind giving him a message? Just say I won\'t call on him tomorrow.
替他害臊
tì tā hàisào
be ashamed of him
替他活动
tì tā huódònɡ 
put in a word for him; use one\'s influence on his behalf
新旧交替。
Xīn jiù jiāotì。 
The new replaces the old.

xīn jiù tǐzhì de jiāotì

jiāotì yǎnzòu liǎngguó yuèqǔ
play music of the two countries alternately

Yǐjīngpài rén lái jiētì tā de gōngzuò。

Jiùbiàn yě tì wǒ mǎi yì běn。

没等我开口，他就抢先替我说了。
Néi děngwǒ kāikǒu，tā jiù qiǎngxiān tì wǒ shuō le。
Before I could open my mouth, he hastened to speak on my behalf (or he went ahead and said it for me).
替某人开脱
tì mǒu rén kāituō
plead for sb.

Láo nín jià，tì wǒ xiě fēng xìn ba！

màomíngdǐngtì 
take another\'s place by assuming his name

Tā bú dàn bùchéngrèn cuòwù，fǎn\'ér tì zìjǐ mǒ fěn。

yǐ shíwù dàitì
in kind

They launched a furious whirlwind attack on the enemy.
他虽然很有成就，但为人从不骄狂。
Tā suīrán hěnyǒu chéngjiù，dàn wéirén cóngbùjiāokuáng。
He is not proud despite his great achievement.
你这样狂气，是不会有人喜欢你的！
Nǐ zhèyàng kuángqì，shì búhuì yǒurén xǐhuan nǐ de！
You are so arrogant that no one will like you.
他脸上这副狂劲好象在告诉别人：他最强！
Tā liǎnshàng zhè fù kuángjìn hǎo xiàng zài gàosù biérén：tā zuì qiáng！
His presumptuous appearance seems to say that he is the best.
他粗狂的行事作风得罪了不少人。
Tā cūkuáng de xíngshì zuòfēng dézuì le bùshǎo rén。
His undisciplined and wild style of behavior has offended a lot of people.
在狂欢节期间，你会看到，所有人都是开心的。

You can see that all of the people at the carnival are happy.
他的狂妄肆行激怒了在场的所有人。
Tā de kuángwàng sìxíng jīnù le zài chǎng de suǒyǒurén。
His conceited behavior triggered the anger of all the people present.
彝族人民要在火把节这一天举火狂欢。

People of the Dai nationality light fires and hold celebrations on the day of the Torch Festival.
狂风旋卷着大量的沙尘呼啸而过，路人纷纷闭上了眼睛。
Kuángfēng xuánjuǎn zhe dàliàng de shāchén hūxiào érguò，lùrén fēnfēn bìshàng le yǎnjīng。
The strong wind howled past with a lot of sand in it, which forces pedestrians to shut their eyes one after another.
狂人。
鲁迅的《狂人日记》是中国现代小说的奠基石。
鲁迅将《狂人日记》等14篇小说辑集成书，取名《呐喊》。

他为人骄狂。
敌人猖狂进犯
敌人疯狂反扑
这个人太狂妄了，不知天高地厚。
这个人也太狂了
这个人太猖狂，应该让他尝点苦头。
狂怒之下，出口伤人。
人们对足球的狂热一时还不会降温。
We met Hope, a dog deliberately blinded because he barked at passers-by while guarding a factory.
Wǒmen yùdàole Hope，zhè shì yìzhī yóuyú zài kānhù gōngchǎng shí zǒngshì duì guòwǎng de xíngrén kuángfèi ér bèi rén nòngxiāle yǎnjing de gǒu。

The twisted branches of the old tree are swaying wildly in the gale.
这棵大树在狂风暴雨中傲然挺立。
Zhè kē dàshù zài kuángfēng bàoyǔ zhōng àorán tǐnglì。
The big tree stands tall in the rainstorm.

A ferocious tornado attacked the city not long ago, and caused serious damage.

His undisciplined and wild style of behavior has offended a lot of people.
如果没有大红伞的庇护，这些罪犯不会如此猖狂。

The criminals wouldn\'t be so savage if they weren\'t protected by powerful people.
在经历了这次打击之后，他的行为有些癫狂。

He became a little deranged after the attack.
老鼠搬家，牛羊狂躁，有可能是地震噩兆。
Lǎoshǔ bānjiā，niú yáng kuángzào，yǒu kěnéng shì dìzhèn èzhào。
When rats move house and cows and sheep become wild, it is a sign of an earthquake.
早在宋代，“盂兰盆法会”不仅是佛家的盛事，也是各界百姓乞福、逛街、狂欢、聚会的节日。
Zǎo zài Sòngdài，
As early as the Song dynasty, the Buddhist Ghost Festival was a great event, not only for Buddhists, but also for men of all walks of life to get together, pray, stroll along the street and celebrate.
那些侵略者就像匪盗，疯狂地掠夺别人的财产。
Nàxiē qīnlüèzhě jiù xiàng fěidào，fēngkuáng de lüěduó biérén de cáichǎn。
The invaders were like robbers and thieves who plundered other people\'s possessions.
他虽然很有成就，但为人从不骄狂。
Tā suīrán hěnyǒu chéngjiù，dàn wéirén cóngbùjiāokuáng。
He is not proud despite his great achievement.
叫啸着的狂风把一棵大树都吹折了。

The roaring wind damaged a big tree.
彝族人民要在火把节这一天举火狂欢。

People of the Dai nationality light fires and hold celebrations on the day of the Torch Festival.
他不知天高地厚口出狂言，一定会吃亏的。
Tā bùzhī tiāngāo dìhòu kǒuchū kuángyán，yídìng huì chīkuī de。
He will suffer from boasting and having no idea of his limitations.
你如此狂悖，不服管教，早晚是会出事的！
Nǐ rúcǐ kuángbèi，bùfú guǎnjiào，zǎowǎn shì huì chūshì de！
You are so presumptuous and beyond control that you will have trouble one day.
这幅字是用狂草写成，气势磅礴，是幅好字！
Zhè fú zì shì yòng kuángcǎo xiěchéng，qìshì pángbó，shì fú hǎo zì！
Written in a wild cursive hand, this calligraphy is powerful and very nice.
他年少狂荡，需要管教！
Tā niánshào kuángdàng，xūyào guǎnjiào！
The young profligate needs to be controlled.
这段时间油价狂跌，对司机来说可是个好消息！
Zhè duàn shíjiān yóujià kuángdiē，duì sījī láishuō kěshì gè hǎo xiāoxi！
The price for oil has fallen sharply, which is good news for drivers.
在舞台上的那个歌手一面狂歌，一面舞动着自己的身体。
Zài wǔtái shàng de nàge gēshǒu yí miàn kuánggē，yí miàn wǔdòng zhe zìjǐ de shēntǐ。
The singer sings with wild joy and gyrates at the same time onstage.
他仰望天空狂呼，抱怨命运的不公平！
Tā yǎngwàng tiānkōng kuánghū，bàoyuàn mìngyùn de bùgōngpíng！
Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
说狂话有什么用呢，还不如踏踏实实地干出个样子来呢！
Shuō kuánghuà yǒu shénme yòng ne，hái bùrú tàtàshíshí de gàn chū gè yàngzi lái ne！
Wild talk has no use. It would be better to do something steadily.
在狂欢节期间，你会看到，所有人都是开心的。
Zài kuánghuānjié qījiān，nǐ huì kàndào，suǒyǒurén dōushì kāixīn de。
You can see that all of the people at the carnival are happy.
有这股子狂劲，没准他真能赢得最后的胜利。
Yǒu zhègǔzi kuángjìn，méizhǔn tā zhēn néng yíngdé zuìhòu de shènglì。
With his fanaticism, he may win at last.
他脸上这副狂劲好象在告诉别人：他最强！
Tā liǎnshàng zhè fù kuángjìn hǎo xiàng zài gàosù biérén：tā zuì qiáng！
His presumptuous appearance seems to say that he is the best.
前不久，这个城市遭受了龙卷风的狂烈袭击，损失很严重。
Qián bùjiǔ，zhège chéngshì zāoshòu le lóngjuǎnfēng de kuángliè xíjī，sǔnshī hěnyánzhòng。
A ferocious tornado attacked the city not long ago, and caused serious damage.
他已经狂乱到不知道自己在做什么了！
Tā yǐjing kuángluàn dào bùzhīdào zìjǐ zài zuò shénme le！
He was so utterly confused that he did not even know what he was doing.
她的长发被海风吹得狂乱飘舞。
Tā de chángfà bèi hǎifēng chuī de kuángluàn piāowǔ。
Her long hair is waving disorderly in the sea wind.
他这种狂虐的症状一定要及早治疗才好。
Tā zhèzhǒng kuángnüè de zhèngzhuàng yídìng yào jízǎo zhìliáo cái hǎo。
His terrible symptoms should be cured as early as possible.
她有什么好狂气的，不就是刚当上学习委员嘛。
Tā yǒu shénme hǎo kuángqì de，bú jiùshì gāng dāngshàng xuéxí wěiyuán ma。
How can she be so arrogant? She has only been elected as a study leader right now.
你这样狂气，是不会有人喜欢你的！
Nǐ zhèyàng kuángqì，shì búhuì yǒurén xǐhuan nǐ de！
You are so arrogant that no one will like you.
狂涛一阵一阵地袭来，海边的茅草屋眼看要被淹没了。
Kuángtāo yízhèn yí zhèn de xílái，hǎibiān de máocǎowū yǎnkàn yào bèi yānmò le。
Raging waves are sweeping the seashore; the thatched hut at the seaside will be submerged soon.
这伙抢银行的狂徒已经被警方擒获了。
Zhè huǒ qiǎng yínháng de kuángtú yǐjing bèi jǐngfāng qínhuò le。
The ferocious robbers who robbed the bank have been caught by the police.
她在台上狂舞时，就像一个活跃的精灵！
Tā zài tái shàng kuángwǔ shí，jiù xiàng yígè huóyuè de jīnglíng！
When dancing wildly onstage, she looks just like a pretty elf.
大坝塌了，江水狂泻下来，势不可挡。
Dàbà tā le，jiāngshuǐ kuángxiè xiàlái，shì bùkědǎng。
The dam collapsed, and the water plummeted irresistibly.
他太渴了，见到水壶就抱着一通狂饮。
Tā tài kě le，jiàndào shuǐhú jiù bào zhe yítòng kuángyǐn。
He is so thirsty that he drinks heavily while holding a jug.
这几个小小的毛贼居然如此猖狂。
Zhè jǐgè xiǎoxiǎo de máozéi jūrán rúcǐ chāngkuáng。
How can these petty thieves be so rampant?
面对疯狂的匪徒他毫不畏惧，怒喝一声就冲了上去。
Miànduì fēngkuáng de fěitú tā háobú wèijù，nùhè yìshēng jiù chōng le shàngqù。
In the face of such crazy gangs, he had no fear. Instead, he charged towards them with an angry shout.
劈面吹来的狂风使他睁不开眼睛。
Pīmiàn chuīlái de kuángfēng shǐ tā zhēngbùkāi yǎnjīng。
He couldn\'t open his eyes when the gale was blowing dead against him.
狂风吹过，老树虬枝在风中乱摇。
Kuángfēng chuīguò，lǎoshù qiúzhī zài fēng zhōng luànyáo。
The twisted branches of the old tree are swaying wildly in the gale.
他是一个色情狂，总是干出一些变态的事情。
Tā shì yígè sèqíngkuáng，zǒng shì gànchū yìxiē biàntài de shìqing。
He is an erotomanic, and always doing something abnormal.
他文风疏狂，以气势取胜。
Tā wénfēng shūkuáng，yǐ qìshì qǔshèng。
He writes unconventionally, and outshines others by his imposing manner.
他的狂妄肆行激怒了在场的所有人。
Tā de kuángwàng sìxíng jīnù le zài chǎng de suǒyǒurén。
His conceited behavior triggered the anger of all the people present.
这匹烈马挣断了我的套马杆狂奔起来。
Zhè pǐ lièmǎ zhēngduàn le wǒ de tàomǎgān kuángbēn qǐlái。
The horse broke away from my horse pole and ran wild.
这棵大树在狂风暴雨中傲然挺立。
Zhè kē dàshù zài kuángfēng bàoyǔ zhōng àorán tǐnglì。
The big tree stands tall in the rainstorm.
布兰妮鲜甜悦耳的歌声让歌迷们为她疯狂。
Bùlánnī xiāntián yuè\'ěr de gēshēng ràng gēmímen wèi tā fēngkuáng。
Britney Spears makes her fans crazy for her with her sweet songs.
狂风旋卷着大量的沙尘呼啸而过，路人纷纷闭上了眼睛。
Kuángfēng xuánjuǎn zhe dàliàng de shāchén hūxiào érguò，lùrén fēnfēn bìshàng le yǎnjīng。
The strong wind howled past with a lot of sand in it, which forces pedestrians to shut their eyes one after another.
炒股失败，他阳狂躲债。
Chǎogǔ shībài,tā yángkuáng duǒzhai.
He failed in stock speculation, and feigned madness to escape a debt.
疯狂的歹徒以自爆结束了他罪恶的生命。
Fēngkuáng de dǎitú yǐ zìbào jiéshù le tā zuìè de shēngmìng。
The crazy bandit attempted to end his evil life with a suicide bomb.
听说棕榈油可以减肥，广大 肥胖女士疯狂抢购。
Tīngshuō zōnglǘyóu kěyǐ jiǎnféi，guǎngdà féipàng nǚshì fēngkuáng qiǎnggòu。
It was said palm oil can help weight loss, so many obese women rushed crazily to buy it.
这段狂想曲能令人联想到那辽阔的草原！
Zhè duàn kuángxiǎngqǔ néng lìngrén liánxiǎngdào nà liáokuò de cǎoyuán！
The rhapsody reminds people of a vast plain.

bǎ qián zhuāngjìn zìjǐ de yāobāo
pocket the money
哈腰捡钱包
hāyāo jiǎnqiánbāo
stoop to pick up one\'s wallet
腰包。
因私事招待客人，应该自己掏腰包。
小心被人掏腰包。
It\'s going to cost me thousands out of my own pocket.
花的这几千块钱都要我自己掏腰包。
He says it never crossed his mind to pocket the money.
他说他从没有想过要把钱装进自己的腰包。
to put money in sb\'s pocket
把钱放入某人腰包
He hates to dig down into his own money for someone else.
Tā tǎoyàn wèi biérén tāoyāobāo。
他讨厌为别人掏腰包。
I had to dip into my pocket to pay for this meal.
Wǒ bùdébú zìtāo yāobāo zhīfù zhè yī cān。
我不得不自掏腰包支付这一餐。
Unbuckle your pack\'s waistbelt before starting.
开始前要解开你的背包腰带。
This long, often colorful and simple-patterned dress includes a full skirt, gathered waist, and tightfitting bodice.
这种洋装很长，样式简单，往往色彩鲜艳，包括一条长裙、束腰和紧身上衣。
The young man stooped to pick up the girl\'s purse.
Zhège niánqīngrén wānyāo jiǎn qǐ le zhè míng nǚhái de qiánbāo。
这个年轻人弯腰捡起了这名女孩的钱包。
直起腰板儿
zhíqǐ yāobǎnr
straighten one\'s back
他八十多了，腰板儿还挺硬朗。
Tā bāshí duō le，yāobǎnr hái tǐngyìnglǎng。
He\'s well over eighty, but he\'s still quite strong.

Tā bāshísuì le，yāobǎnr hái tǐng yìnglǎng。
She\'s eighty years old, but still in excellent health.
挺直腰板。
Even after a hard lick, he can stand right back up and continue fighting.
Jíshǐ āile chóngchóng de yì quán，tā yě néng tǐngzhí yāobǎn，jìxù zhàndòu。
即使挨了重重的一拳，他也能挺直腰板，继续战斗。
The old man still walks erectly.
Zhè wèi lǎorén réngrán néng tǐngzhíyāobǎn zǒulù。
这位老人仍然能挺直腰板走路。
The guards stood stiff-backed and unsmiling.
Wèibīng tǐngzhe yāo、bǎnzhe liǎn zhànzài nàlǐ。
卫兵挺着腰、板着脸站在那里。
He had spent all day crouched down cleaning the floor.
Tā yì zhěngtiān dōu wānyāo-qūxī de qīngjié dìbǎn。
他一整天都弯腰屈膝地清洁地板。
半山腰
bànshānyāo 
halfway up a hill
山的半中腰有一座亭子。
Shān de bàn zhōng yāo yǒu yízuò tíngzi。
A pavilion is halfway up the hill.
他的话说到半中腰就停住了。
Tā de huà shuōdào bàn zhōng yāo jiù tíngzhù le。
He broke off in the middle of a sentence.
腰里别着旱烟袋
yāo lǐ bié zhe hànyāndài 
with a pipe stuck in one\'s belt
她双手叉腰站着。
Tā shuāngshǒu chāyāo zhàn zhe。
She stood with arms akimbo.
有他给你撑腰，你还怕什么？
Yǒu tā gěi nǐ chēngyāo，nǐ hái pà shénme? 
He\'s backing you up, so what\'s there to fear?
肝(腰椎)穿剌
gān（yāozhuī）chuāncì
liver (lumbar) puncture
他扭了腰，动不了。
Tā niǔ le yāo dòng bu liǎo。
He\'s strained his back and can\'t move.
腰有点发酸
yāo yǒudiǎn fāsuān
have a slight backache
这方儿专治腰痛。
Zhè fāngr zhuān zhì yāotòng。
This prescription is especially good for backaches.
裤腰要放一厘米。
Kùyāo yào fàng yì límǐ。
Please let these trousers out 1 cm. at the waist.
猫拱了拱腰。
Māo gǒng le gǒng yāo。
The cat arched its back.
腰身滚圆的母牛
yāoshēn gǔnyuán de mǔniú
a round-bellied cow
我一哈腰把钢笔掉在地上了。
Wǒ yì hāyāo bǎ gāngbǐ diàozài dì shàng le。
As I bent over, my fountain pen fell to the ground.
水深及腰。
Shuǐ shēn jí yāo。
The water came up to one\'s waist (or was waist-deep).
拦腰抱住
lányāo bàozhù
seize sb. by the waist (or round the middle) from behind
大坝把河水拦腰截断。
Dàbà bǎ héshuǐ lányāo jiéduàn。
The dam cut the river in the middle.
黄腰柳莺
huánɡyāo liǔyīnɡ 
yellow-rumped willow warbler

Tā máo zhe yāo qiāoqiāo de liūguò chuāngkǒu。
He bent over and slipped by the window.
因山势高峻，乃在山腰休息片时。
Yīn shānshì gāojùn，nǎi zài shānyāo xiūxi piànshí。
It was a steep climb, so we rested for a while halfway up the hill.
我有什么能耐呀，全靠各位撑腰呢！
Wǒ yǒu shénme néngnài ya，quán kào gè wèi chēngyāo ne！
What could I do without you people backing me up?
扭了腰
niǔ le yāo
sprain one\'s back
她扭摆着腰肢走过来。
Tā niǔbǎi zhe yāozhī zǒu guòlái。
She walked over swaying her hips.
她走起路来扭动着腰肢。
Tā zǒuqǐ lù lái niǔdòng zhe yāozhī。
She walks with a swaying motion.

yāo pèi shǒuqiānɡ

zài qí yāo shēn de shuǐ lǐ zhùbà

wānyāo qūbèi

Tā yìquán dǎ zài wǒ xīnwōr lǐ，tòng de wǒ bàntiān zhí bu qǐ yāo lái。

diǎntóuhāyāo

The cupping treatment worked wonders! My back feels better.
我们快到半当腰时，忽然下雨了。

When we climbed halfway up the hill, it suddenly began to rain.

Kànjiàn bànshānyāo nà piàn hóngyè le ma？

我哥哥长得膀大腰圆。
Wǒ gēge zhǎng de bǎngdà yāoyuán。

他系上了红腰带，说是为了避邪。
Tā jìshàng le hóngyāodài，shuō shì wéi le bìxié。
He had a red band on his waist to ward off evil spirits.
这山太高，刚到半山腰我们就已经体力不支。
Zhè shān tài gāo，gāng dào bànshānyāo wǒmen jiù yǐjing tǐlì bùzhī。
We were already exhausted half way up this high mountain.
炽灼的太阳把庄稼晒得都弯了腰。
Chìzhuó de tàiyáng bǎ zhuāngjià shài de dōu wān le yāo。
The scorching sun has bent the crops.
他把钥匙链挂在当腰。
Tā bǎ yàoshiliàn guà zài dāngyāo。
He hung the key chain on his waistband.
爬到半山腰，他累得直发喘。
Pá dào bànshānyāo，tā lèi de zhí fāchuǎn。
He was short of breath by the time he had climbed half-way up the mountain.
小蜜蜂采蜜时，蜂腰拱起，显出一副特别认真的样子。
Xiǎomìfēng cǎimì shí，fēngyāo gǒngqǐ，xiǎnchū yífù tèbié rènzhēn de yàngzi。
The bees arch their waist when they gather nectar.
爱美的姑娘全都希望自己拥有苗条的蜂腰。

All girls want to have wasp-shaped waists.
那个跳舞的女孩儿穿着高腰裤袜。
Nà gè tiàowǔ de nǚháir chuān zhe gāoyāo kùwà。
The girl who is dancing is wearing high-waisted pantyhose.
这孩子怎么总喜欢弯腰弓背？
Zhè háizi zěnme zǒng xǐhuan wānyāo gōngbèi？
Why does the kid like to bend his back all the time?
由于长年的劳累，她现在走路时总是佝偻着腰。
Yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，tā xiànzài zǒulù shí zǒngshì gōulóu zhe yāo。
Now because of long-term fatigue, her back is always bent over when she walks.
我推箱子时用力过猛，把腰闪了。
Wǒ tuī xiāngzi shí yònglì guòměng，bǎ yāo shǎn le。
I strained my back for I used too much strength when pushing the box.
他很讲究衣着品位，连裤腰带都是名牌的。
Tā hěnjiǎngjiū yīzháo pǐnwèi，lián kùyāodài dōushì míngpái de。
He shows good taste in clothes; even his waist belts are of a famous brand.
他家很穷，总用麻经儿当裤腰带。
Tā jiā hěnqióng，zǒng yòng májīngr dāng kùyāodài。
He is very poor, and always uses flaxen rope as a waistband.
由于长年的劳累，他的腰椎已经严重受损。
Yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，tā de yāozhuī yǐjing yánzhòng shòusǔn。
His lumbar vertebrae have been seriously distorted due to long years\' tiring work.
她每天都束腰，看起来是瘦点了，但不知道对身体是否有害。
Tā měitiān dōu shùyāo，kànqǐlái shì shòudiǎn le，dàn bùzhīdào duì shēntǐ shìfǒu yǒu hài。
She wears a girdle around her waist every day, and indeed looks thinner, but I don\'t know whether it is harmful to her body.
这个束腰的裙子，越发衬托出了她的高挑婀娜。
Zhège shùyāo de qúnzi，yuè fā chèntuō chū le tā de gāotiāo ēnuó。
This waist-hugging dress sets off her slimness and grace.
小时候，我们的裤子都是不系腰带的，就缝一根松紧带在里边。

写字的时候一定要挺直腰板。
Xiězì de shíhou yídìng yào tǐngzhí yāobǎn。
You must straighten your back when writing at a desk.

Mom has just bought a very beautiful yellow apron.

The members of the military team have a Mauser pistol attached to their waist.

It requires great skill to bend down, otherwise you can easily get hurt.
他把钱缝在腰袋里，怕别人知道。
Tā bǎ qián féngzài yāodài lǐ，pà biérén zhīdào。
He puts his money in a belt-pouch, fearing others knowing where his money is.

Gǔshíhou rénmén pèi yāodāo fángdí。
In ancient times, people wore side swords to guard themselves.

Yāotuǐ hǎo，shēntǐ hǎo jiùshì fúqì a。

树林里有一条隐秘的幽径直通到半山腰。
Shùlín lǐ yǒu yìtiáo yǐn mì de yōujìng zhítōng dào bànshānyāo。
There is a secret and quiet path in the forest that leads directly to a place half way up the mountain.
从远处看去，半山腰上长满了鱼鳞松。
Cóng yuǎnchù kànqù，bànshānyāo shàng zhǎngmǎn le yúlínsōng。
Seen from a distance, yeddo spruces grew all around the middle of the mountainside.
从远处看，长在半山腰上的针叶林郁郁苍苍。
Cóng yuǎnchù kàn，zhǎng zài bànshānyāo shàng de zhēnyèlín yùyùcāngcāng。
Seen from the distance, the coniferous forest growing half way down the hill is lush and green.
将军的腰间系着一根别致的武装带。

The general wears a nice sam browne belt around his waist.

Tā yāojiān biézhe yìzhīqiāng。

半山腰
bànshānyāo 
halfway up a hill
因山势高峻，乃在山腰休息片时。
Yīn shānshì gāojùn，nǎi zài shānyāo xiūxi piànshí。
It was a steep climb, so we rested for a while halfway up the hill.
到了半山腰，我们坐下来舒舒气。
Dào le bàn shānyāo，wǒmen zuòxiàlái shūshu qì。
Halfway up the hill, we sat down to catch our breath.
看见半山腰那片红叶了吗？
Kànjiàn bànshānyāo nà piàn hóngyè le ma？
Did you see the red leaves halfway up the hill?
这山太高，刚到半山腰我们就已经体力不支。
Zhè shān tài gāo，gāng dào bànshānyāo wǒmen jiù yǐjing tǐlì bùzhī。
We were already exhausted half way up this high mountain.
爬到半山腰，他累得直发喘。
Pá dào bànshānyāo，tā lèi de zhí fāchuǎn。
He was short of breath by the time he had climbed half-way up the mountain.
树林里有一条隐秘的幽径直通到半山腰。
Shùlín lǐ yǒu yìtiáo yǐn mì de yōujìng zhítōng dào bànshānyāo。
There is a secret and quiet path in the forest that leads directly to a place half way up the mountain.
从远处看去，半山腰上长满了鱼鳞松。

cāozuò guīchéng

Tā liú zhe bāzìhú，kàn qǐlái tǐng dòu de。

那场见义勇为事迹报告会挺感人。

That public lecture on heroic deeds was very moving.
总是在最吃劲的时候，他能够挺身而出。

He always stepped forward during strenuous times.
这儿环境挺好的，再也不用打熬过日子了。

这孩子躺在地上打挺儿撒娇。

作为家里的顶梁柱，此时他必须挺身而出。

As the pillar of the family, he must step forward boldly now.
多日不见，我挺想念他的。
duō rì bú jiàn，wǒ tǐng xiǎngniàn tā de。
I haven\'t seen him for many days, and begin to miss him.
平时看你挺胆儿大，怎么真遇到事就二乎了！

You seem to be bold, but how come you flinch when anything happens?
这孩子怎么了，平常挺活泼的今天怎么发苶了？

挺大个人了，还动不动就撒娇，瞧着真犯贱。

She is too old to act like a spoiled child.
他们单位饭堂的伙食还不错，饭菜品种挺多的。

Their staff restaurant serves nice meals with a lot of variety.
他已经病得形销骨立了，不知还能挺多久。
Tā yǐjing bìng de xíngxiāo gǔlì le，bùzhī hái néng tǐng duōjiǔ。
He is so sick that he is as thin as a skeleton. No one knows how much longer he can hold out.
她瓜子儿脸，高个头，是个挺漂亮的姑娘。

She has an oval face and is very tall, which makes her a beautiful girl.
怎么也不相信一个闺阁女子在关键时刻能挺身而出。

I could not believe that a girl could bravely step forward  at such a crucial moment.
挺小的一个几案上放满了书。
Tǐngxiǎo de yígè jǐàn shàng fàngmǎn le shū。
The little table is full of books.

他穿着将校呢制的大衣，很是英俊挺拔。
Tā chuān zhe jiàngxiàoní zhì de dàyī，hěnshì yīngjùn tǐngbá。
He looks handsome and upright in a worsted coat.
