Gōngyuán lǐ zhòng le sān kē tǐngbá de jīnsōng。
There are three tall golden pines in the garden.
别看她平时挺能说的，真遇到该表明态度时，她就卷舌不语了。
Biékàn tā píngshí tǐng néngshuō de，zhēn yùdào gāi biǎomíng tàidu shí，tā jiù juǎnshé bùyǔ le。
Though she talks a lot generally, when it is time to make her attitude clear, she says nothing.
她说话有点儿卷舌，挺好听的。
Tā shuōhuà yǒudiǎnr juǎnshé，tǐng hǎotīng de。
Her words sound a little retroflex, they are quite pleasant to hear.
这个电影，开首挺平淡，越往后看越精彩。
Zhège diànyǐng，kāishǒu tǐng píngdàn，yuè wǎnghòu kàn yuè jīngcǎi。
The beginning of the film is very flat, but then it gets more and more interesting.
他看上去挺聪明的，做起事来竟然这么笨。
Tā kànshàngqù tǐng cōngmíng de，zuòqǐshìlái jìngrán zhème bèn。
He seems to be smart, but behaves so stupidly.
这个专题片虽然有意义，但可视性不强，挺枯燥。
Zhège zhuāntípiān suīrán yǒu yìyì，dàn kěshìxìng bùqiáng，tǐng kūzào。
Although this monographic film is meaningful, it isn\'t fun to watch and is very boring.
仙人球挺耐旱，半个月不浇水也不会枯死。
Xiānrénqiú tǐng nàihàn，bàngèyuè bùjiāoshuǐ yě búhuì kūsǐ。
Bulbous cactus is drought-enduring and will not wither even without water for half a month.
用苦槠木做的家具挺耐用。
Yòng kǔzhūmù zuò de jiājù tǐng nàiyòng。
Furniture made of castanopsis sclerophylla is durable.
他走路时身体不挺直，那背影酷肖我去世的爷爷。
Tā zǒulù shí shēntǐ bùtǐngzhí，nà bèiyǐng kùxiào wǒ qùshì de yéye。
He walks with a bent back, the very image of my dead grandpa.
他能够在国家危难之时挺身而出、匡时济世，实在是不可多得的人才。
Tā nénggòu zài guójiā wēinán zhī shí tǐngshēn ér chū、kuāngshí jìshì，shízai shì bùkě duōdé de réncái。
He came out boldly to assist the society when the country was in danger. He is a real hero.
他还挺会来事儿的，这么快就得到了领导的喜爱。
Tā hái tǐng huì láishìr de，zhème kuài jiù dédào le lǐngdǎo de xǐ\'ài。
He is quite sophisticated and has won the favour of leaders in a short time.
过年买的年货太多，把挺大的冷柜都塞满了。
Guònián mǎi de niánhuò tài duō，bǎ tǐngdà de lěngguì dōu sāimǎn le。
We have bought too many special purchases for the Spring Festival, and crammed the big refrigerator.
这里的妈祖庙香火很盛，据说挺灵验的。
Zhèlǐ de māzǔmiào xiānghuǒ hěnshèng，jùshuō tǐng língyàn de。
The Mazu temple here attracts a large number of pilgrims, and it is said that it is quite effective.
他名气挺大，今日一见却很差劲，可见他不过是个名实不符的人。
Tā míngqì tǐngdà，jīnrì yíjiàn què hěnchàjìn，kějiàn tā búguò shì gè míngshí bùfú de rén。
He enjoys a great reputation, but he was disappointed when I saw him today. Therefore, he is more in name than in reality.
她觉得当个肖像模特儿挺简单，只要坐在画室里就行了。
Tā juédé dāng gè xiāo xiàng mótèr tǐng jiǎndān，zhǐyào zuòzài huàshì lǐ jiùxíng le。
She thinks that it is easy to be an image model for she only needs sitting in an atelier.
这根木棍挺结实，登山的时候可以当拐杖用。
Zhè gēn mùgùn tǐng jiēshi，dēngshān de shíhou kěyǐ dāng guǎizhàng yòng。
This wooden stick is quite durable, and can be used as a walking stick in climbing mountains.
爷爷虽然年老体衰，但精神还挺好。
Yéye suīrán niánlǎo tǐshuāi，dàn jīngshén hái tǐnghǎo。
Although my grandfather is old and feeble, he is in high spirits.
女家对这个未来的女婿印象挺好。
Nǚjiā duì zhège wèilái de nǚxù yìn xiàng tǐnghǎo。
The girl\'s family have a good impression of their future son-in-law.
别看她日常懒散疲沓，干起工作来还挺麻利的！
Biékàn tā rìcháng lǎnsǎn pídá，gànqǐ gōngzuò lái hái tǐng máli de！
Although she is lazy and sluggish, she is keen and neat in her work.
从这里就可以看到远处挺拔高耸的电视塔。
Cóng zhèlǐ jiù kěyǐ kàndào yuǎnchù tǐngbá gāosǒng de diànshìtǎ。
You can see the distant, tall TV tower from here.
解放军战士挺拔的动作是刻苦训练的结果。
Jiěfàngjūn zhànshì tǐngbá de dòngzuò shì kèkǔ xùnliàn de jiéguǒ。
The soldiers look vigorous and forceful partly because of the long-term hard training.
我军已经挺进东北三省。
Wǒ jūn yǐjing tǐngjìn dōngběi sānshěng。
The troops have pressed onward into the three provinces of the country\'s northeast.
他获得了这届奥运会的挺举冠军。
Tā huòdé le zhè jiè àoyùnhuì de tǐngjǔ guànjūn。
He is the champion in this year\'s Olympics clean and jerk.
这棵大树在狂风暴雨中傲然挺立。
Zhè kē dàshù zài kuángfēng bàoyǔ zhōng àorán tǐnglì。
The big tree stands tall in the rainstorm.
每次冲锋的时候他都挺身冲在最前面。
Měi cì chōngfēng de shíhou tā dōu tǐngshēn chōngzài zuì qiánmiàn。
In every charge, he is at the front.
在那个危机时刻，一名解放军战士挺身而出。
Zài nàge wēijī shíkè，yì míng jiěfàngjūn zhànshì tǐngshēn ér chū。
At that critical moment, one soldier stepped forward bravely.
他什么家务活也不干，回来就知道挺尸。
Tā shénme jiāwùhuó yě búgàn，huílái jiù zhīdào tǐngshī。
He doesn\'t do any household chores. Every day after coming back from work, he just goes straight to bed to sleep.
行军礼的时候一定要做到挺胸抬头。
Xíng jūnlǐ de shíhou yídìng yào zuòdào tǐngxiōng táitóu。
When giving a salute, you must straighten your back and hold your head high.

sleep with one\'s head resting on one\'s arm
振臂高呼
zhènbìgāohū 
raise one\'s arm and shout (slogans, etc.)
助一臂之力
zhù yíbìzhīlì 
lend sb. a helping hand
攘臂
rǎngbì
push up one\'s sleeves and bare one\'s arms (in excitement or agitation)
袒胸露臂
tǎnxiōnglùbì
exposing one\'s neck and shoulders; décolleté

Tā huī yuán shǒubì，jīzhòngle qiú。

市场竞争
shìchǎngjìngzhēng
competition for markets
市场竞争日益加剧
shìchǎng jìngzhēng rì yì jiājù
increasingly intense market competition
联营经济也逐步加入到市场竞争中来。
Liányíng jīngjì yě zhúbùjiārù dào shìchǎng jìngzhēng zhōng lái。
Joint Ventures are also beginning to take part in market competition.
残酷的市场竞争
cánkùde shìchǎngjìngzhēng
brutal market competition
由于市场竞争十分激烈，大部分小公司被收购。
Yóuyú shìchǎngjìngzhēng shífēn jīliè，dàbùfèn xiǎo gōngsī bèi shōugòu。
As the market is very competitive, the majority of small companies have been taken over.
我们要规制市场秩序，保护公平竞争。
Wǒmen yào guīzhì shìchǎng zhìxù，bǎohù gōngpíng jìngzhēng。
We should regulate market rules and protect fair competition.
面对市场竞争，识时务者应该锐意创新。
不能用关门封杀的办法应对市场竞争
在竞争激烈的市场大潮中破浪前行。

一个没有高效行政体系的公司是不可能在市场竞争中存活下来的。

食品市场的竞争者们竞相压价。
The battle for the computer market has now reached critical mass.

现在电脑市场的竞争已经到了极其关键的阶段。
Without a skilled work force, we cannot compete in world markets.
Méiyǒu shúliàn de gōngrén，wǒmen wúfǎ zài Shìjiè shìchǎng jìnxíng jìngzhēng。
没有熟练的工人，我们无法在世界市场进行竞争。

Larger firms are better able to survive in a competitive market.

更大的公司更能够在竞争市场生存。
Weighing up the competition is an important part of marketing.
Quánhéng jìngzhēng shì shìchǎngyíngxiāo de zhòngyào bùfen。
权衡竞争是市场营销的重要部分。
They glutted the market in order to cause a shakeout of their competitors.
Tāmen bǎ guòliàng shāngpǐn tóufàng dào shìchǎng shàng，shìtú dǎozhì jìngzhēngduìshǒu de zhèndòng。

我们为了取得更多的市场份额会开出具有竞争力的价格。
Without competition there would be no market.
Méiyǒu jìngzhēng jiù méiyǒu shìchǎng。
没有竞争就没有市场。
I constantly conduct market research to monitor our competitors.
我一直坚持做市场调研，来防范我们的竞争对手。

当市场很小时，出现了若干竞争对手，但随后有些公司就倒闭了。

你必须要不断增强你的竞争优势，以保持你对其他人的领先地位。
People will seize on any opportunity to reduce competition.
Rénmen huì zhuāzhù yíqiè jīhuì jiǎn xiǎo jìngzhēng。
人们会抓住一切机会减小竞争。
Mia decides to use Ken\'s obvious rivalry with Joan to set them against each other.
Mǐyà juédìng lìyòng Kěn hé Qióng zhījiān míngxiǎn de jìngzhēng shǐ tāmen hùwéi dírén。
米娅决定利用肯和琼之间明显的竞争使他们互为敌人。
This caused a rival party to set up against him.
Zhè yǐnqǐ díduìdǎng hé tā jìnxíng jìngzhēng。
这引起敌对党和他进行竞争。
Here\'s how to stand head and shoulders above your competitors.
Zhè shì rúhé chāoyuè nǐ de jìngzhēngduìshǒu de fāngfǎ。
这是如何超越你的竞争对手的方法。
The company towers above their competitors in this area.
Zài zhè yì lǐngyù，gāi gōngsī yuǎnyuǎn chāoguò qítā jìngzhēngzhě。
在这一领域，该公司远远超过其他竞争者。
How does your company stack up against your competitors.
Nǐ de gōngsī shì zěnyàng yǔ nǐ de jìngzhēng duìshǒu jiàoliàng de ne ？
你的公司是怎样与你的竞争对手较量的呢？
She beat some tough competition for the number one slot.
Tā yǐ dì-yī míng de chéngjì jībàile xǔduō yǒulì de jìngzhēngduìshǒu。
他以第一名的成绩击败了许多有力的竞争对手。
His competitor\'s success was a bitter pill to take.
Tā nányǐ jiēshòu jìngzhēng duìshǒu de chénggōng。
他难以接受竞争对手的成功。
Without competition there would be no market.
Méiyǒu jìngzhēng jiù méiyǒu shìchǎng。
没有竞争就没有市场。
Competition was pushing them to the wall.
Jìngzhēng jiāng tāmen bī dàole juéjìng。
竞争将他们逼到了绝境。
Your role in the projects precludes your involvement in the competitive project.
Nǐ zài gāi xiàngmù zhōng de juésè shǐ nǐ wúfǎ cānyù dào zhège jìngzhēngxìng xiàngmù zhōng。
你在该项目中的角色使你无法参与到这个竞争性项目中。
The competition was tough.
Jìngzhēng hěn jīliè。
竞争很激烈。
Our business was hurt by the new competition.
Wǒmen de yèwù shòudàole xīn jìngzhēng duìshǒu de yánjùn tiǎozhàn。
我们的业务受到了新竞争对手的严峻挑战。
The goal was to best the competition.
Mùdì shì zhànshèng jìngzhēngduìshǒu。
目的是战胜竞争对手。
The cyclist has eliminated all the competitors in the race.

这名自行车选手在比赛中淘汰了所有的竞争者。
The company matched the discount policy of its competitors.
Gāi gōngsī cǎiqǔle yǔ qí jìngzhēng duìshǒu xiāngtóng de zhékòu zhèngcè。
该公司采取了与其竞争对手相同的折扣政策。
He had an edge on the competition.
Tā zài jìngzhēng zhōng chǔyú yǒulì dìwèi。
他在竞争中处于有利地位。
Business competition can be fiendish at times.
Yǒushí shāngyè jìngzhēng shì fēicháng cánkù de。
有时商业竞争是非常残酷的。

Tā zūnzhòng tā de jìngzhēng duìshǒu。

他们把过量商品投放到市场上，试图导致竞争对手的震动。

There was keen competition for the nomination.
Zhè yī tímíng de jìngzhēng fēicháng jīliè。

竞技场
jìngjìchǎng
arena
竞技场上一争高下
同场竞技
The Roman circus was used for chariot and horse races.
Luómǎ jìngjìchǎng shì yònglái jǔxíng chǎngpéng shuānglún mǎchē jìngsài hé sàimǎ bǐsài de。
罗马竞技场是用来举行敞篷双轮马车竞赛和赛马比赛的。

城市中贴满了海报，把竞技场作为一个文化景点进行宣传。
The arena takes the form of a rectangular area bounded by walls.
Jìngjìchǎng shì yíkuài gāoqiáng bāowéi de chángfāngxíng。
竞技场是一块高墙包围的长方形。

他不喜欢打篮球什么的，就爱下个围棋。
Tā bùxǐhuan dǎ lánqiú shénme de，jiù ài xià gè wéiqí。
He doesn\'t go in for basketball and things like that; what he\'s really keen on is go.

He challenged me to a game of go.
对于下中国象棋，你就只知其一，不知其二了。

Regarding Chinese Chess, you just have a one-sided view.

He has memorized a great number of formulae in preparation for the go game.

Xianming is good at playing chess. He always feels like a sovereign descending to the world in front of the chess board.
这盘棋已经是死局了，怎么下你都输。

This chess game is already over, you are doomed to lose.

zhùshè zhēntóu 
syringe needle

注射针头
zhùshè zhēntóu 
syringe needle
麻醉师给她注射了一针后，她就失去知觉了。
Mázuìshī gěi tā zhùshè le yì zhēn hòu，tā jiù shīqù zhījué le。
She was unconscious after being injected by the anesthetist.
他心脏骤停，医生赶紧为他注射了强心针。
Tā xīnzàng zhòutíng，yīshēng gǎnjǐn wèi tā zhùshè le qiángxīnzhēn。
His heart halted suddenly, the doctor injected him with a cardiotonic needle.
针孔堵住了，注射剂出不来。
Zhēnkǒng dǔzhù le，zhùshèjì chū bùlái。
The sty is blocked, and the injection can\'t flow through.
这种针剂，医生让我每次注射2安瓿。
Zhèzhǒng zhēnjì，yīshēng ràng wǒ měi cì zhùshè èr ānbù。
My doctor has prescribed two ampoules of this injectant for every injection.
She died as a direct result of this injection.
注射这支针剂是导致她死亡的直接原因。
Dr Cox, 47, who gave a dying patient a lethal injection, would not name the hospital yesterday.
Kǎokèsī yīshēng，47 suì，gěi yí gè chuíwēi de bìngrén zhùshèle zhìmìng de dúzhēn，tā zuótiān jùjué shuōchū nà jiā Yīyuàn de míngzi。
考克斯医生，47岁，给一个垂危的病人注射了致命的毒针，他昨天拒绝说出那家医院的名字。
He shot himself up with a needle in the bathroom of an airplane.

他用针头在飞机的盥洗室里给自己注射。
作为今后工作的指针
zuòwéi jīnhòu gōngzuò de zhǐzhēn

针叶树种
zhēnyè shùzhǒng
coniferous trees
The Wollemi pine found in Australia is a surviving specimen of a conifer thought to have been long extinct and therefore known as a living fossil.

With the communication of the flu, the government started the national campaign against it.
由于流感广泛传播，政府在全国开展了预防流感的活动。
There was widespread danger of disease.
Jíbìng de wēixiǎn guǎngfàn chuánbō。
疾病的危险广泛传播。
The news spread far and wide.
Xiāoxi chuánbō hěn guǎng。
消息传播很广。
The network broke for a commercial.
Wǎngluò zhōng zànshí chābō yíduàn guǎnggào。
网络中暂时插播一段广告。
It was presented without commercial breaks.
Tā méiyǒu chābō shāngyè guǎnggào。
它没有插播商业广告。
咱们这儿安上电视转播站了。
Zánmen zhèr ānshàng diànshì zhuǎnbōzhàn le。
A TV relay station has been set up here.
电视转播群众大会实况
diànshì zhuǎnbō qúnzhòng dàhuì shíkuàng
televise a mass rally; live telecast of a mass rally
今天下午电视台会转播这场表演赛。
Jīntiān xiàwǔ diànshìtái huì zhuǎnbō zhèchǎng biǎoyǎnsài。
The TV station will rebroadcast the exhibition match this afternoon.
这条消息首播后不到一小时，世界各地电台和电视台便纷纷转播。
Zhè tiáo xiāoxi shǒubō hòu bú dào yì xiǎoshí，shìjiè gè dì diàntái hé diànshìtái biàn fēnfēn zhuǎnbō。
Less than an hour following its first transmission, the news was reported by radio and TV stations across the world.

The designers of the television studio had tried hard to be futuristic.
Diànshìzhuǎnbō shì de shèjìzhěmen hěn nǔlì de shǐ qí gèng jù xiàndàihuà。
电视转播室的设计者们很努力的使其更具现代化。
播电视剧时插播广告。
建立网媒、纸媒和广播电视的立体传媒体系。
Will existing television and radio stations，or satellite and cable TV win out in the popularity stakes?
Zài shòu huānyíng chéngdù fāngmiàn，xiànyǒu diànshì，guǎngbōdiàntái，huò wèixīngdiànshì hé yǒuxiàndiànshì huì shèngchū ma？
在受欢迎程度方面，现有电视，广播电台，或卫星电视和有线电视会胜出吗？
the news
[电视，广播] 新闻
The earliest television broadcasts began in the 1930s.
Zuì zǎo de diànshìguǎngbō kāishǐ yú èrshí shìjì sānshí niándài。

on the television/radio
在电视上/广播中
canned commercials
广播(或电视)中的录音广告节目

Wǒmen huì kǎolǜ kāitōng yǔ xiànyǒu de guǎngbōdiànshì，wèixīngdiànshì huò yǒuxiàndiànshì xiāngguān de xīn de diànshì píndào。

听众点播的节目
tīngzhòng diǎnbō de jiémù 
a programme by request; (listeners\') request
听众点播的爵士乐
tīngzhòng diǎnbō de juéshìyuè 
jazz for the asking

Diànshìtái zhǔnshí zài měiwǎn qīdiǎn bōbào tiānqì yùbào。
The TV station broadcasts the weather report at 7 o\'clock every evening.
新闻联播每晚7点准时播出。
Xīnwén liánbō měi wǎn 7 diǎn zhǔnshí bōchū.

点播歌曲
The reality show has been spotted at ten p.m.
真人秀定于晚上十点播出。
They can all be persuaded to play requests if you buy them a drink.

如果你给他们买点喝的，就可以在他们那里点播节目。

The station closes down at 11 p.m. everyday.

A year or so later I listened to the radio for the first time.

春播作物
chūnbō zuòwù 
spring-sown crops
春天播种，秋天收获
chūntiān bōzhǒng，qiūtiān shōuhuò
sow in spring and reap in autumn
春天播种以前，先要把地翻耕一下。
Chūntiān bōzhǒng yǐqián，xiān yào bǎ dì fāngēng yíxià。
Before sowing seeds in the spring, one must first till the land.
我们开春穴播种子，过些时候这就是一片玉米地了。
Wǒmen kāichūn xuébō zhǒng zi，guò xiē shíhou zhè jiùshì yípiàn yùmǐdì le。
We sow the seeds at the beginning of the spring. A few months later there will be a corn field here.
适时播种小春作物才能获得好的收成。
Shìshí bōzhòng xiǎochūn zuòwù cáinéng huòdé hǎo de shōuchéng。
The time of sowing the autumn crops is crucial for a harvest.

抓紧春播时机
收看春节联欢晚会实况转播。

传播花粉
chuánbō huāfěn 
carry pollen (from flower to flower); pollinate
传播知识(消息)
chuánbō zhīshi（xiāoxi）
spread knowledge (news)

zhìzhǐ jíbìng de chuánbō 
check the spread of the disease
直线传播
zhíxiàn chuánbō 
rectilinear propagation
散射传播
sànshè chuánbō 
scatter propagation

Kōngqì shì chuánbō shēngyīn de méijiè。
Air is a medium of sound.

研究表明，声波在同一介质中的传播速度和波源的速度无关。
Yánjiū biǎomíng，shēngbō zài tóng yí jièzhì zhōng de chuánbō sùdù hé bōyuán de sùdù wúguān。
According to certain research, the spread velocity of sound waves has nothing to do with the speed of the ripples.
各种传染病的传播途径都不同。
Gè zhǒng chuánrǎnbìng de chuánbō tújìng dōu bùtóng。
Infectious diseases have different infection channels.

Zhè liǎngnián bàokǎo chuánbōxué de xuésheng yuèláiyuè duō le。
This years, more and more students register for the examination on communications.

Zhèzhǒng diànnǎo bìngdú chuánbō hěnlìhai，nǐ yídìng yào xiǎoxīn。

Taking protective measures while having sexual contact can effectively prevent AIDS from spreading.

将某物减少…/将某物减少到…

A term is in direct proportion to another term if it increases (or decreases) as the other increases (or decreases).
Rúguǒ mǒuyí xiàng suí lìngyī xiàng zēngjiā（huò jiǎnshǎo）ér xiāngyìng zēngjiā（huò jiǎnshǎo），zhè yíxiàng jiù yǔ lìng yī xiàng chéng zhèngbǐ。
如果某一项随另一项增加（或减少）而相应增加（或减少），这一项就与另一项成正比。
A term is in inverse proportion to another term if it increases (or decreases) as the other decreases (or increases).
Rúguǒ mǒuyí xiàng suí lìngyī xiàng zēngjiā（ huò jiǎnshǎo） ér xiāngyìng jiǎnshǎo（ huò zēngjiā），zhè yíxiàng jiù yǔ lìngyī xiàng chéng fǎnbǐ。

搬迁减价
bānqiān jiǎnjià 
removal sale
自行车减价出让
zìxíngchē jiǎn jià chū ràng
sell one\'s bicycle at a reduced price
减价出售
jiǎnjià chūshòu 
sell at a reduced prices
减价一成
jiǎnjià yì chéng
be marked down by 10%
商场大减价了，好多东西现价比原价整整便宜了一半。
Shāngchǎng dà jiǎnjià le，hǎoduō dōngxi xiànjià bǐ yuánjià zhěngzhěng piányile yíbàn。
The mall has a sale now and the prices of many things have dropped by 50%.
现在各大商场都在举办羽绒服大减价活动。

All the big shopping centers are having a sales campaign for down jackets now.
汽车不断减价。
Qìchē búduàn jiǎnjià。
Cars are continually coming down in price.
减价商品能凭礼券购买。

儿童票价减半
értóngpiàojià jiǎnbàn

a storewide sale

“大减价”

减价促进了消费。

to lower prices
减低价格

a minus sign

Once the project is completed, flood peaks can be controlled on the upper reaches, thus relieving pressure on the lower reaches of the river.
九减四得五。
Jiǔ jiǎn sì dé wǔ。
Nine minus four is five. or Four from nine is five.
工作热情有增无减
gōngzuò rèqíngyǒuzēngwújiǎn 
work with ever increasing zeal
儿童票价减半
értóngpiàojià jiǎnbàn 
half-price fare for children
减半征收所得税
jiǎnbàn zhēngshōu suǒdéshuì 
be allowed a 50% reduction of income tax
减产百分之十。
Jiǎn chǎn bǎifēnzhī shí。
Output dropped by ten per cent.
减低速度
jiǎndī sùdù 
lower (or slacken) speed; slow down
耗煤率减低了百分之五。
Hàoméilǜ jiǎndī le bǎifēn zhī wǔ。
Consumption of coal went down by 5%.
减缓进程
jiǎnhuǎn jìnchénɡ 
slow down the pace (or progress)
减价出售
jiǎnjià chūshòu 
sell at a reduced prices
减价一成
jiǎnjià yì chéng
be marked down by 10%
成绩好的学生可以减免学费。
Chéngjì hǎo de xuéshengkěyǐ jiǎnmiǎn xuéfèi。
Students with high marks can enjoy a partial or total tuition waiver.
减摩合金
jiǎnmó héjīn 
antifriction alloy (or metal)
减摩轴承
jiǎnmó zhóuchéng
antifriction bearing
减摩涂层
jiǎnmó túcéng
triction coat
减轻病人的痛苦
jiǎnqīngbìngrén de tòngkǔ 
alleviate (or ease) a patient\'s suffering
减轻处分
jiǎnqīngchufèn
mitigate a punishment
体力大大减弱
tǐlì dàdà jiǎnruò 
be much weakened physically
风势减弱了。
Fēngshì jiǎnruò le。
The wind has subsided.
音响效果不好，使演出大为减色。
Yīnxiǎngxiàoguǒ bùhǎo，shǐ yǎnchū dà wéi jiǎnsè。
Poor acoustics spoilt the performance.
减少非生产性开支
jiǎnshǎo fēishēngchǎnxìngkāizhī 
reduce nonproductive expenditure
精简机构，减少层次
jīngjiǎn jīgòu，jiǎnshǎo céngcì
simplify the administrative structure and eliminate duplication
减缩开支
jiǎnsuō kāizhī 
reduce expenditure
视力(记忆力)减退。
Shìlì(jìyìlì) jiǎntuì。
One\'s eyesight (memory) is failing.
雨后炎热减退了许多。
Yǔ hòu yánrè jiǎntuì le xǔduō。
After the rain, the heat abated considerably.
裁员减薪
cáiyuán jiǎnxīn 
cut down the number of employees and reduce the salary
减压器
jiǎnyāqì 
pressure reducer; decompressor
这个单位将补充自然减员约百人。
Zhège dānwèi jiāngbǔchōngzìrán jiǎnyuán yuē bǎi rén。
About 100 persons will replace those who retire or cannot work for various reasons in this unit.
减震器
jiǎnzhènqì 
shock absorber; damper
这个研究所用经济手段控编，行政人员减少百余人。
Zhège yánjiūsuǒ yòngjīngjì shǒuduàn kòngbiān，xíngzhèngrényuán jiǎnshǎo bǎi yú rén。
The research institute used economic means to control the staff size and cut administrative staff by over a hundred.
偏差减为一毫米。
Piānchā jiǎn wéi yì háomǐ。
The deviation is reduced to one millimetre.
裁减冗员
cáijiǎn rǒngyuán
reduce redundant personnel
我的记忆力日见衰减。
Wǒ de jìyìlì rì jiàn shuāijiǎn。
My memory is failing fast.
衰减器
shuāijiǎnqì
attenuator
水势有所减退。
Shuǐshì yǒu suǒ jiǎntuì。
The flood subsided (or abated) a little.
缩减开支
suōjiǎn kāizhī
reduce (or cut) spending
缩减军费
suōjiǎn jūnfèi
cut back military expenditure
体重减轻
tǐzhòngjiǎnqīng
lose weight
减磨涂层
jiǎn mó túcéng
friction coat
削减非生产性开支
xuējiǎn fēishēngchǎnxìngkāizhī
cut down nonproductive expenditures; cut back on nonproductive spending
削减军费
xuējiǎn jūnfèi
cut down military expenditures
今年5月份，在港外待卸的货船，平均每天下降到276艘，比压船最多的2月份减少77艘。
Jīnnián wǔyuèfèn，zài gǎngwài dàixiè de huòchuán，píngjūn měitiān xiàjiàng dào èrbǎiqīshíliù sōu，bǐ yāchuán zuìduō de èryuèfèn jiǎnshǎo qīshíqīsōu。
In May this year, the average number of cargo ships waiting to be unloaded in the harbor every day dropped to 276, 77 less than the record number in February.
缩短总装时间，以减少耗费
suōduǎn zǒngzhuāngshíjiān，yǐ jiǎnshǎo hàofèi 
cut costs by shortening assembly time
削减
xuējiǎn
cut (down); reduce; slash; whittle down
为了减少开支，他们不得不裁兵。
Wèile jiǎnshǎo kāizhī，tāmen bùdébùcáibīng。
They had to reduce troops to save money.
由于公司不景气，老板不得不通过裁人来减少支出。
Yóuyú gōngsī bùjǐngqì，lǎobǎn bùdébùtōngguò cáirén lái jiǎnshǎo zhīchū。
Due to the companies poor performance, the boss had to reduce the size of staff in order to reduce costs.
为了节省开支，公司打算撤减一部分员工。
Wèile jiéshěng kāizhī，gōngsī dǎsuàn chèjiǎn yíbùfen yuángōng。
The company intends to layoff a portion of the staff to reduce costs.
加减乘除是最基本的运算法则。
Jiājiǎnchéngchú shì zuì jīběn de yùnsuàn fǎzé。
Addition, subtraction, multiplication and division are all basic operations.
赤霉菌的出现使小麦减产。
Chìméijūn de chūxiàn shǐ xiǎomài jiǎnchǎn。
The appearance of gibberella has brought a reduction in wheat output.
有试验表明，花生重茬两年会减产8－10％。
Yǒu shìyàn biǎomíng，huāshēng chóngchá liǎng nián huì jiǎnchǎn bǎifēnzhī bā dào shí。
A trial showed that two years of continuous harvest of  peanuts would reduce output by 8 -10%.
现在依然是春寒料峭，要注意增减衣服。
Xiànzài yīrán shì chūnhán liàoqiào，yào zhùyì zēngjiǎn yīfu。
Now there is still a chill in the spring air. Be careful to change your clothes accordingly.
村委会决定减免向村民征收的几项杂费。
Cūnwěihuì juédìng jiǎnmiǎn xiàng cūnmín zhēngshōu de jǐ xiàng záfèi。
The villagers\' committee has decided to reduce or remit several extra charges imposed on the villagers.
务必把这版书的错漏减到最小。
Wùbì bǎ zhè bǎn shū de cuòlòu jiǎn dào zuìxiǎo。
Mistakes and careless omissions in this edition of the book must be reduced to minimum.
防治稻螟是今年农业减灾的中心任务。
Fángzhì dàomíng shì jīnnián nóngyè jiǎnzāi de zhōng xīn rènwù。
Eradicating and controlling caterpillars is the central task of this year\'s disaster-reduction work.
为了节约开支，各部门的定编还要缩减。
Wèile jiéyuē kāizhī，gè bùmén de dìngbiān háiyào suōjiǎn。
In order to save money, the number of fixed employees in each department has to be reduced.
繁芜的文字最好删减，这样文章才会显得简洁。
Fánwú de wénzì zuìhǎo shānjiǎn，zhèyàng wénzhāng cái huì xiǎnde jiǎnjié。
Unnecessary words should be removed to make the article more concise.
她要减肥，所以拒绝吃肥肉。
Tā yào jiǎnféi，suǒyǐ jùjué chī féiròu。
She wants to lose weight, so she refuses to eat fat.
有了新的灌溉技术，伏旱天粮食也不会减产。
Yǒu le xīn de guàngài jìshù，fúhàntiān liángshí yě búhuì jiǎnchǎn。
With the new irrigation technology, the land will yield no less grain even in dry weather.
为了缓减交通压力，在这里最好建造一座高架路。
Wèile huǎnjiǎn jiāotōng yālì，zài zhèlǐ zuìhǎo jiànzào yízuò gāojiàlù。
To ease traffic pressure, we\'d better build an overhead road here.
湖南省将对公务员的职位进行核减。
Húnán Shěng jiāng duì gōngwùyuán de zhíwèi jìnxíng héjiǎn。
The posts of civil servants will be cut in Hunan Province.
他说绕呼啦圈可以减肥，所以我就买了一个来试试。
Tā shuō rào hūlāquān kěyǐ jiǎnféi，suǒyǐ wǒ jiù mǎi le yígè lái shìshì。
He said using a hola hoop could help me lose weight, so I bought one.
人们在荒丘上种植了树木，以减少水土流失。
Rénmen zài huāngqiū shàng zhòngzhí le shùmù，yǐ jiǎnshǎo shuǐtǔ liúshī。
People planted trees on the waste hills to decrease water and soil loss.
这个设备可以使水回游，减少浪费。
Zhège shèbèi kěyǐ shǐ shuǐ huíyóu，jiǎnshǎo làngfèi。
This equipment can make water flow back, thus reducing waste.
这个月的工资根据你们各自的表现有所加减。
Zhège yuè de gōngzī gēnjù nǐmen gèzì de biǎoxiàn yǒusuǒ jiājiǎn。
Your salary this month will be adjusted according to your performance.
股市不稳，很多股民开始减仓。
Gǔshì bùwĕn，hĕn duō gǔmín kāishǐ jiǎncāng.
The stock market is becoming volatile, so many shareholders begin to sell shares.
乱吃减肥药对人体的危害很大。
Luànchī jiǎnféiyào duì réntǐ de wēihài hěndà。
Taking obesity drugs without prescription is harmful to one\'s body.
新经理一上任就制定了减亏增盈的计划。
Xīn jīnglǐ yí shàngrèn jiù zhìdìng le jiǎnkuī zēngyíng de jìhuà。
The newly-elected manager formulated a plan for turning the loss into a profit as soon as he took the post.
在拐弯处司机减慢了车速，这种做法很正确。
Zài guǎiwānchù sījī jiǎnmàn le chēsù，zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ hěnzhèngquè。
It is laudable that the driver slows down when he making a turn at the corner.
三个苹果减去一个还剩下几个呢？
Sān gè píngguǒ jiǎnqù yígè hái shèngxià jǐgè ne？
How many apples are left if I take one from three?
为了减省家里的开支妈妈从不买新衣服。
Wèile jiǎnshěng jiā lǐ de kāizhī māma cóng bùmǎi xīn yīfu。
Mother never buys new clothes, so as to save money for the family.
今年的洪涝天气使花生减收，花生价格因此提高了很多。
Jīnnián de hónglào tiānqì shǐ huāshēng jiǎnshōu，huāshēng jiàgé yīncǐ tígāo le hěnduō。
So many floods have cut down on the production of peanuts; as a result, the price of peanuts has gone up a great deal.
这辆车的减速器性能很差，可以换一个了。
Zhèliàngchē de jiǎnsùqì xìngnéng hěnchà，kěyǐ huàn yígè le。
The reduction gear of the car doesn\'t work well and should be replaced by a new one.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
政府对条件困难的家庭实行贷款减息政策。
Zhèngfǔ duì tiáojiàn kùnnan de jiātíng shíxíng dàikuǎn jiǎnxī zhèngcè。
The government has reduced the lending rate for poor families.
到下午的时候风力已经减小了，我们可以出门了。
Dào xiàwǔ de shíhou fēnglì yǐjing jiǎnxiǎo le，wǒmen kěyǐ chūmén le。
The wind abated in the afternoon and we could go out again.
工厂为了减削开支取消了班车，让工人自行准备交通工具。
Gōngchǎng wèi le jiǎnxiāo kāizhī qǔxiāo le bānchē，ràng gōngrén zìxíng zhǔnbèi jiāotōng gōngjù。
In order to cut expenses, the factory cancelled the regular bus and had workers use their own means of transportation.
压缩机的减压阀被安装错了，不能正常使用。
Yāsuōjī de jiǎnyāfá bèi ānzhuāng cuò le，bùnéng zhèngcháng shǐyòng。
The compression release valve of the compressor has been misplaced, so it doesn\'t work properly.
在路面不平的路段他开启了减震器。
Zài lùmiàn bùpíng de lùduàn tā kāiqǐ le jiǎnzhènqì。
While driving on the bumpy section of the road, he switches on the shock-absorbers.
国家为扶持企业发展，减征了很多税收。
Guójiā wèi fúchí qǐyè fāzhǎn，jiǎnzhēng le hěnduō shuìshōu。
In order to encourage the growth of enterprises, the government has cut many taxes.
第一次上战场，把人当作箭靶来看就会减轻很多压力。
Dìyī cì shàng zhànchǎng，bǎ rén dàngzuò jiànbǎ lái kàn jiùhuì jiǎnqīng hěnduō yālì。
When you go to the battlefield for the first time, look at the enemy as a target and you will feel less scared.
这台新式交换机大大的减少了交换台的工作量。
Zhètái xīnshì jiāohuànjī dàdà de jiǎnshǎo le jiāohuàntái de gōngzuòliàng。
The new switchboard shares much of the workload of the telephone exchange.
这孩子太爱乱花钱，这月要节减他的零花钱。
Zhè háizi tài ài luàn huāqián，zhè yuè yào jiéjiǎn tā de línghuāqián。
The child is wasteful with money, so I am going to cut his  allowance.
在洪汛期到来之前，大家早已做好了抗涝减灾准备。
Zài hóngxùnqī dàolái zhīqián，dàjiā zǎoyǐ zuòhǎo le kànglào jiǎnzāi zhǔnbèi。
Before the arrival of the flood season, everybody was ready to fight floods and reduce damage.
你又迟到了，为此要扣减你50元的奖金。
Nǐ yòu chídào le，wèicǐ yào kòujiǎn nǐ wǔshíyuán de jiǎngjīn。
You are late again. Your bonus will be reduced by fifty percent.
我家的花一天天地累减，都是因为妈妈没有时间照料它们。
Wǒjiā de huā yìtiāntiān de lěijiǎn，dōushì yīnwèi māma méiyǒu shíjiān zhàoliào tāmen。
The flowers in our house are becoming less and less. That is all because Mother has no time to take care of them.
这顿利口的饭菜让我的减肥计划又泡汤了。
Zhè dùn lìkǒu de fàncài ràng wǒ de jiǎnféi jìhuà yòu pàotāng le。
The delicious food made my plan to lose weight fail again.
初春的北京凉意未减，依然很冷。
Chūchūn de Běijīng liángyì wèijiǎn，yīrán hěnlěng。
In early spring, the cold still lingers in Beijing, and it is still very cold.
我们应减少水资源的漏失。
Wǒmen yīng jiǎnshǎo shuǐ zīyuán de lòushī。
We should reduce the leakage and loss of water.
螺旋藻有减肥的作用，受到许多女士的欢迎。
Luóxuánzǎo yǒu jiǎnféi de zuòyòng，shòudào xǔduō nǚshì de huānyíng。
Spiral alga has a slimming effect, it is popular with many women.
自从国家取消了农业税，农民就可以不纳粮了，负担减轻了许多！
Zìcóng guójiā qǔxiāo le nóngyèshuì，nóngmín jiù kěyǐ bú nàliáng le，fùdān jiǎnqīng le xǔduō！
Since the abolishment of agricultural duty, farmers no longer need to pay for money and rice, and their burden has reduced a lot.
今年起我们减免了多项农牧业税，农民都拍手称赞。
Jīnnián qǐ wǒmen jiǎnmiǎn le duō xiàng nóng mùyèshuì，nóngmín dōu pāishǒu chēngzàn。
From this year on, we have reduced several agricultural and livestock breeding taxes, so the peasants clap and cheer.
长期喝普洱茶有减肥的功效。
Chángqī hē pǔ\'ěrchá yǒu jiǎnféi de gōngxiào。
If you keep drinking Pu\'er tea every day for a long time you will lose weight.
最近公司要减员，他寝食不安，就怕没了工作。
Zuìjìn gōngsī yào jiǎnyuán，tā qǐnshí bùān，jiù pà méi le gōngzuò。
The company is going to cut staff, which makes him worried both when awake and asleep about losing his job.
裁减冗官是政府今年的工作重点之一。
Cáijiǎn rǒngguān shì zhèngfǔ jīnnián de gōngzuò zhòngdiǎn zhīyī。
To reduce unnecessary officials is a focal point of government work this year.
润滑剂的作用是减轻机器零件之间的摩擦。
Rùnhuájì de zuòyòng shì jiǎnqīng jīqì língjiàn zhījiān de mócā。
The function of lubricant is to abate friction between parts of a machine.
这个文件中的文字，一个也不许删减。
Zhège wénjiàn zhōng de wénzì，yígè yě bùxǔ shānjiǎn。
Not a single word in the document can be cut.
政府创造了宽松的投资环境，甚而还可减免税收。
Zhèngfǔ chuàngzào le kuānsōng de tóuzī huánjìng，shènér hái kě jiǎnmiǎn shuìshōu。
The government has created a favorable environment for investment, and has even agreed to reduce or exempt tax.
心狠手辣是这伙儿歹徒的一贯特点，我们一定要尽快破案，减少受害者的数量。
Xīnhěn shǒulà shì zhè huǒr dǎitú de yíguàn tèdiǎn，wǒmen yídìng yào jìnkuài pòàn，jiǎnshǎo shòuhàizhě de shùliàng。
Extreme cruelty and lack of mercy have always been these gangsters\' characteristics. We must crack the case as soon as possible so as to reduce the number of sufferers.
我正在减肥，坚决不吃甜品。
Wǒ zhèngzài jiǎnféi，jiānjué bùchī tiánpǐn。
I\'m on a diet, so I don\'t eat desserts.
我们都知道，车辆行驶到弯道的时候应该减速。
Wǒmen dōu zhīdào，chēliàng xíngshǐ dào wāndào de shíhou yīnggāi jiǎnsù。
We all know that cars should slow down on curved roads.
常年使用温吞水洗脸使他脸上皱纹减少。
Chángnián shǐyòng wēntūnshuǐ xǐliǎn shǐ tā liǎnshàng zhòuwén jiǎnshǎo。
You can reduce facial wrinkles by always washing your face with warm water.
高速公路上雾蒙蒙的，请你减速慢行。
Gāosù gōnglù shàng wùmēngmēng de，qǐng nǐ jiǎnsù mànxíng。
Everything is blurred by the fog on the highway, please slow down.
为了减肥，她每天晚上都坚持只喝稀粥而不吃脂肪含量高的食物。
Wèile jiǎnféi，tā měitiān wǎnshàng dōu jiānchí zhǐ hē xīzhōu ér bùchī zhīfáng hánliàng gāo de shíwù。
She persists in having gruel for supper instead of rich food in an attempt to lose weight.
那家跨国集团决定精减所有部门的闲员。
Nà jiā kuàguó jítuán juédìng jīngjiǎn suǒyǒu bùmén de xiányuán。
The international company decided to lay off its redundant staff in all its departments.
县府方面对减轻农民负担的工作一向十分重视。
Xiànfǔ fāngmiàn duì jiǎnqīng nóngmín fùdān de gōngzuò yí xiàng shífēn zhòngshì。
The county government always attaches great importance to works aimed at reducing farmers\' burdens.
商场大减价了，好多东西现价比原价整整便宜了一半。
Shāngchǎng dà jiǎnjià le，hǎoduō dōngxi xiànjià bǐ yuánjià zhěngzhěng piányile yíbàn。
The mall has a sale now and the prices of many things have dropped by 50%.
虽然老师劝过他无数次，他对网络游戏的热衷却丝毫未消减。
Suīrán lǎoshī quàn guò tā wúshù cì，tā duì wǎngluò yóuxì de rè zhōng què sīháo wèi xiāojiǎn。
Though criticized by the teacher many times, he is still obsessed with internet games.
她为减肥日渐削瘦，把身体都弄垮了，昨天去看医生了。
Tā wèi jiǎnféi rìjiàn xiāoshòu，bǎ shēntǐ dōu nòng kuǎ le，zuótiān qù kàn yīshēng le。
She has lost so much weight that there is something wrong with her health. Therefore, she went to see the doctor yesterday.
你应该在扬尘天气的时候减少出行。
Nǐ yīnggāi zài yángchén tiānqì de shíhou jiǎnshǎo chūxíng。
You should reduce your travel during dusty weather.
积极开展阳光工程，又省能源又减少污染 。
Jījí kāizhǎn yángguāng gōngchéng，yòu shěng néngyuán yòu jiǎnshǎo wūrǎn。
We should develop the sunshine project actively, it can save energy resources as well as reduce pollution.
我最近减肥，衣带都宽了好多。
Wǒ zuìjìn jiǎnféi，yīdài dōu kuān le hǎoduō。
I lost some weight recently, my clothes are much larger.
经济危机中，来银行挤兑的人一直有增无减。
Jīngjì wēijī zhōng，lái yínháng jǐduì de rén yìzhí yǒuzēng wújiǎn。
During the economic crisis, the number of people making a run on the bank kept increasing.
根据渔情可以看出，今年鱼场不会减产。

According to the condition of the fish, the fish farm\'s production volume this year will not decrease.
为了减肥，姐姐五年来一直在坚持练瑜珈。

In order to lose weight, my sister practiced yoga for five years.
现在各大商场都在举办羽绒服大减价活动。
Xiànzài gè dà shāngchǎng dōu zài jǔbàn yǔróngfú dà jiǎnjià huódòng。
All the big shopping centers are having a sales campaign for down jackets now.
快要驶入匝道了，请减速慢行。
Kuàiyào shǐrù zādào le，qǐng jiǎnsù mànxíng。
We are going to enter the ring road; please slow down the vehicle.

Recently, the upward trend of the company\'s stock has slown to some extent.

His poor eyesight results from keratitis.

Cars are continually coming down in price.

gōngsī juédìng cáiyuán，cóng\'ér xuējiǎnchéngběn。
The company decided to lay people off, and thus reduce their costs.

to reduce sth by/to
将某物减少…/将某物减少到…
The explicit use of energy conservation can often save mathematical labor by eliminating one integration.
直接应用能量守恒可以减少一次积分,这就常常能减少数学运算。
A term is in direct proportion to another term if it increases (or decreases) as the other increases (or decreases).
Rúguǒ mǒuyí xiàng suí lìngyī xiàng zēngjiā（huò jiǎnshǎo）ér xiāngyìng zēngjiā（huò jiǎnshǎo），zhè yíxiàng jiù yǔ lìng yī xiàng chéng zhèngbǐ。
如果某一项随另一项增加（或减少）而相应增加（或减少），这一项就与另一项成正比。
Publishers reduced print runs to cut down the cost of warehousing.

出版商减少了印数以削减库存成本。
A term is in inverse proportion to another term if it increases (or decreases) as the other decreases (or increases).
Rúguǒ mǒuyí xiàng suí lìngyī xiàng zēngjiā（ huò jiǎnshǎo） ér xiāngyìng jiǎnshǎo（ huò zēngjiā），zhè yíxiàng jiù yǔ lìngyī xiàng chéng fǎnbǐ。
如果某一项随另一项增加（或减少）而相应减少（或增加），这一项就与另一项成反比。
Cork ceilings absorb sound.
软木制的天花板能减少回音。

chū yú zhìchénɡ

zhìchéng de péngyou 
a sincere friend

complete sincerity can affect even metal and stone

huái zhe zhēnchéng de yuànwàng

真诚的愿望
zhēnchéng de yuànwàng
a sincere wish (or desire)

zhēnchéng de yǒuyì 
true friendship
真诚地执行协议
zhēnchéng de zhíxíngxiéyì 
implement the agreement in good faith

我真诚地为我所犯的错误抱歉。

我承认我忘记了对你的承诺，我真诚的为此道歉。

说她有时不真诚并不为过。

他的行为是对一个政治信仰盲目忠诚导致的。
One incident in particular had convinced him of her genuineness.
Yóuqí nà jiàn shì shǐ tā xiāngxìnle tā de zhēnchéng。
尤其那件事使他相信了她的真诚。
Special offers are quoted in good faith based on information supplied by retailers.
Jīyú língshòushāng tígōng de xìnxī，wǒmen zhēnchéng de gěichūle zhège tèbié bàojià。
基于零售商提供的信息，我们真诚地给出了这个特别报价。
It strengthened my belief in his sincerity.
Zhè shǐ wǒ gèngjiā xìnrèn tā de zhēnchéng tàidù。
这使我更加信任他的真诚态度。
A dialogue of sincerity and mutual trust can melt a lot of misunderstandings.
真诚的交换意见和相互信任能够消除误解。
I would be true for there are those who trust me.
Wǒ jiāng zuò yí gè chéngshí de rén，yīnwèi yǒu hěn duō xìnrèn wǒ de rén。
我将做一个诚实的人，因为有很多信任我的人。

大家信任他的决定，因为他是个诚实的人。

我是诚心诚意来帮助你的。

I come to help you with all sincerity.

一片诚心
yí piàn chéngxīn 
in all sincerity
她长年吃斋念佛，可诚心了。
Tā chángnián chīzhāi niànfó，kě chéngxīn le。
Over the years she\'s been abstaining from meat and praying to Buddha. She\'s such a devout Buddhist.
诚心
chéngxīn
sincere desire; sincerity; whole-heartedness
初心向佛，贵在诚心。
Chūxīn xiàng fó，guì zài chéngxīn。
Having converted to Buddhism, it was important for him to be pious.
你要是诚心，说不定也会金石为开，让他改变心意呢。
Nǐ yàoshì chéngxīn，shuōbúdìng yě huì jīnshí wéikāi，ràng tā gǎibiàn xīnyì ne。
If you are sincere enough, maybe he will change his mind.
诚心
chéngxīn
sincere
他是真心诚意地帮大家。
Tā shì zhēnxīn chéngyì de bāng dàjiā。
He sincerely wants to help everybody.
她爸爸的一番话说得她心悦诚服。
Tā bàba de yì fān huà shuō de tā xīnyuèchéngfú。
She was completely convinced by her father\'s arguments.
心悦诚服
xīnyuèchéngfú
be completely convinced; feel a heartfelt admiration
他虔诚礼佛，一心向善。
Tā qiánchéng lǐfó，yìxīn xiàng shàn。
He is a pious religious follower, and completely devoted to doing good.
对手的为人和能力，令他心悦诚服。
Duìshǒu de wéirén hé nénglì，lìng tā xīnyuèchéngfú。
He wholeheartedly admired his opponent\'s conduct and ability.
他办事老诚，任务交给他我放心。
Tā bànshì lǎochéng，rènwù jiāogěi tā wǒ fàngxīn。
He is honest and sincere, so I am at ease with having him do the task.
困难诚然很多，但我们有信心克服。
Kùnnán chéngrán hěnduō，dàn wǒmen yǒuxìnxīn kèfú。
Admittedly there are many difficulties, but we are confident of overcoming them.
我是实心实意跟你交朋友的，难道你还看不出来我的诚恳吗？
Wǒ shì shíxīn shíyì gēn nǐ jiāo péngyou de，nándào nǐ hái kànbùchūlái wǒ de chéngkěn ma？
I sincerely want to be your friend. Can\'t you see that?

怀着一颗感恩的心，他毕生都在虔诚地祷告。

Hé tāmen zài yìqǐ búyòng dānxīn tài guò zhíshuài hé tǎnchéng。
和他们在一起不用担心太过直率和坦诚。
Some parents will be very upset, because it cuts across their genuine convictions.

chéngshí kěkào 
honest and dependable

chéngshí láodòng 
honest work

他不是个诚实的人，就爱耍猫儿腻。

不诚实
bùchéngshí
dishonest

She wants to test my honesty.

Tā wéirén chéngdǔ，kěyǐ xìnlài。
He\'s sincere and earnest, and so can be trusted.
态度诚恳
tàidu chéngkěn 
be sincere in what one does and says
诚恳地接受别人的意见
chéngkěn de jiēshòu biérén de yìjiàn

一个诚朴的青年
yígè chéngpǔ de qīngnián

诚朴的工作作风
chéngpǔ de gōngzuò zuòfēng 
a simple and honest work style
她喜爱她的小狗，那小狗也诚然可爱。
Tā xǐ\'ài tā de xiǎogǒu，nà xiǎogǒu yě chéngrán kě\'ài。
She loves her puppy, and the puppy is really lovable.
旱情诚然是严重的，但是它吓不倒我们。
Hànqíng chéngrán shì yánzhòng de，dànshì tā xià bu dǎo wǒmen。
True, the drought is serious, but it can\'t scare us.

chéngshí kěkào

chéngshí láodòng

一片诚心
yí piàn chéngxīn

她长年吃斋念佛，可诚心了。
Tā chángnián chīzhāi niànfó，kě chéngxīn le。

表明诚意
biǎomíng chéngyì

缺乏诚意
quēfá chéngyì

Shuí yě bùhuáiyí nǐ de chéngyì。
No one doubts your sincerity.
诚挚友好的气氛
chéngzhì yǒuhǎo de qìfēn

zhìyǐ chéngzhì de xièyì

chìchéng dàirén

待人诚恳
dàirén chéngkěn

huái zhe zhēnchéng de yuànwàng

《聊斋志异》所记鬼怪故事诚属荒诞不经，然而却能引人入胜，多年来为无数读者所喜爱。
《Liáozhāi ZhìYì》suǒ jì guǐguàigùshì chéngshǔ huāngdànbùjīng，rán\'ér quènéng yǐnrénrùshèng，duōniánlái wéi wúshù dúzhě suǒxǐ\'ài。
Though admittedly wild and fanciful, the ghost stories of the Liao Zhai Zhi Yi have a beauty that has captivated countless readers over the years.

chéngkěn huǐguò

kāichéngbùgōng de tányitán

许多店家都需要通过测试来考察其未来员工是否诚实。。

我们的友情是建立在信任和诚实的基础上的。

我钦佩你的勇气/诚实

我相信诚实是好的。

虔诚的天主教徒/穆斯林{等}

对某人保持忠诚
sb\'s loyalty to sb
某人对某人的忠诚
out of loyalty to sb
出于对某人的忠诚
to be straight with sb
坦诚地对待某人
tongue in cheek
毫无诚意的
to be true to sb
对某人忠诚
yours truly
您忠诚的
with my warmest thanks
顺致我最诚挚的谢意

这个忠诚的导盲犬陪伴玛格丽特去了游乐园。

我承认我忘记了对你的承诺，我真诚的为此道歉。

我喜欢警觉、忠诚并且活跃的狗。

我的叔叔是个虔诚的人，他一直严格遵守十一奉制度。

真诚是交朋友最好的办法。

Tāmen yāoqiú wǒ zhèngmíng xià wǒ de chéngyì。
他们要求我证明下我的诚意。
She congratulated him somewhat insincerely.
Tā zhùhè tā shí bú tài zhēnchéng。
她祝贺他时不太真诚。
Doubt was expressed as to the good faith of the immigrants.
Duì nàxiē yímín de chéngyì biǎoshì huáiyí。
对那些移民的诚意表示怀疑。
He is the honest politician par excellence.
Tā shì gè chéngshí ér yòu jiéchū de zhèngzhìjiā。
他是个诚实而又杰出的政治家。
Her interest in people was unfeigned.
Tā duì rén de guānxīn shì zhēnchéng de。
她对人的关心是真诚的。
His religiousness is dialectically related to his sinfulness.
Tā duì zōngjiào de qiánchéng hé tā de zuì\'è shì biànzhèng de liánxì zài yìqǐ de。
他对宗教的虔诚和他的罪恶是辩证地联系在一起的。
She told him off in spades.
Tā tǎnchéng de zhǐzéle tā。
她坦诚地指责了他。
Her husband was unfaithful.
Tā zhàngfu bù zhōngchéng。
她丈夫不忠诚。
She praised him sincerely for his victory.
Duìyú tā de shènglì，tā zhēnchéng de zànyángle tā。
对于他的胜利，她真诚地赞扬了他。
His men acted disloyally and betrayed him in the end.
Tā de shǔxià duì tā bù zhōngchéng，bìng zuìzhōng chūmàile tā。
他的属下对他不忠诚，并最终出卖了他。
He acted in good faith.
Tā hěn zhēnchéng。
他很真诚。
A person\'s appropriation of property belonging to another is dishonest.
Yí gè rén nuóyòng tārén cáichǎn de xíngwéi shì bù chéngxìn de xíngwéi。
一个人挪用他人财产的行为是不诚信的行为。
He behaved hypocritically by praying piously when people were watching.
Rénmen kànzhe tā de shíhou，tā xūwěi de jiǎzhuāng zìjǐ zài qiánchéng de qídǎo。
人们看着他的时候，他虚伪地假装自己在虔诚地祈祷。
I would be true for there are those who trust me.
Wǒ jiāng zuò yí gè chéngshí de rén，yīnwèi yǒu hěn duō xìnrèn wǒ de rén。
我将做一个诚实的人，因为有很多信任我的人。
He acted dishonestly when he gave the contract to his best friend.
Tā bù chéngshí de bǎ nà fèn hétong jiāogěile zìjǐ zuì hǎo de péngyou。
他不诚实地把那份合同交给了自己最好的朋友。
He acted believably sincere.
Tā biǎoxiàn de wúbǐ zhēnchéng。
他表现得无比真诚。
She was devoutly catholic.
Tā shì yí gè qiánchéng de tiānzhǔ jiàotú。
她是一个虔诚地天主教徒。
He was baronetized for his loyalty to the country.
Tā yīn duì guójiā de zhōngchéng ér shòufēng nánjué。
他因对国家的忠诚而受封男爵。
In her hierarchical set of values honesty comes first.
Zài tā fēn céngcì de jiàzhítǐxì zhōng，chéngshí jūyú shǒuyàodìwèi。
在她分层次的价值体系中，诚实居于首要地位。
The solidness of her faith gave her enduring hope.
Tā duì zhōngchéng de jiānzhēn-búèr gěile tā chángjiǔ de xīwàng。
她对忠诚的坚贞不二给了她长久的希望。
I gave them my candid opinion.
Tā tǎnchéng de xiàng tāmen tánle wǒ de kànfǎ。
他坦诚地向他们谈了我的看法。
Disloyal aides revealed his indiscretions to the papers.
Bù zhōngchéng de zhùshǒu bǎ tā de qīngshuài jǔdòng xièlòu gěi le bàozhǐ。
不忠诚的助手把他的轻率举动泄露给了报纸。
He has always been honest is his dealings with me.
Tā zài yǔ wǒ de jiāoyì guòchéng zhōng shǐzhōng bǎochí chéngshí。
他在与我的交易过程中始终保持诚实。
Either too unsophisticated or too honest to promise more than he could deliver.
Zuòchū chāochū zìjǐ nénglì de xǔnuò，zhè bú shì yīnwèi tài lǎoliàn jiùshì yīnwèi tài chéngshí。
做出超出自己能力的许诺，这不是因为太老练就是因为太诚实。
And it is into these economies where the Pru has been pushing the most investment.
yě zhèngshì zài zhèxiē jīngjì tǐ，bǎo chéng yìzhí zài dàjǔ tóuzī。
也正是在这些经济体，保诚一直在大举投资。
不诚实
bùchéngshí
dishonest
他不是个诚实的人，就爱耍猫儿腻。
Tā búshì gè chéngshí de rén，jiù ài shuǎ māornì。
He is not an honest man, and is fond of playing tricks.
张有田直朴诚实，说话不会拐弯。
ZhāngYǒutián zhípǔ chéngshí，shuōhuà bú huì guǎiwān。
Zhang Youtian is forthright, and never beats about the bush.
我是实心实意跟你交朋友的，难道你还看不出来我的诚恳吗？
Wǒ shì shíxīn shíyì gēn nǐ jiāo péngyou de，nándào nǐ hái kànbùchūlái wǒ de chéngkěn ma？
I sincerely want to be your friend. Can\'t you see that?
She wasn\'t very convinced about the nice distinction between a lie and the untruth.
对于谎言和不诚实之间的细微差别，她还不十分确信。
Dirty politicians are dime a dozen in this town.
Zài zhège zhènshàng jūzhùzhe hěn duō bù chéngshí de zhèngkè。
在这个镇上居住着很多不诚实的政客。
Dishonest claims have an effect on us all.
Bù chéngshí de zhǔzhāng duì wǒmen dàjiā dōu yǒu yǐngxiǎng。
不诚实的主张对我们大家都有影响。
It stank to high heaven.
Tā jí bù chéngshí。
它极不诚实。
Though his methods are indirect they are not dishonest.
Suīrán tā de fāngfǎ shì yūhuí de，dàn zhèxiē fāngfǎ bìngfēi bù chéngshí。
虽然他的方法是迂回的，但这些方法并非不诚实。
He is basically dishonest.
Tā gēnběn bù chéngshí。
他根本不诚实。
An official accused of dishonesty should be suspended forthwith.
Bèi kònggào bù chéngshí de guānyuán yīnggāi mǎshàng bèi tíngzhí。
被控告不诚实的官员应该马上被停职。
Insurance companies are exposed to a moral hazard if the insured party is not honest.
Rúguǒ bèibǎoxiǎnrén bù chéngshí，bǎoxiǎngōngsī huì zāoshòu dàodéfēngxiǎn。
如果被保险人不诚实，保险公司会遭受道德风险。
He acted dishonestly when he gave the contract to his best friend.

他不诚实地把那份合同交给了自己最好的朋友。
All the people I want to work with are really out of my reach to be honest.
Suǒyǒu wǒ xiǎng yìqǐ gōngzuò de rén dōu bú gòu chéngshí。
所有我想一起工作的人都不够诚实。
No man of any honest degree would have adventured his life and his goods among them.
Rènhé shāoshāo chéngshí de rén dōu búhuì ná zìjǐ de shēngmìng hé měidé qù mào nàzhǒng xiǎn。
任何稍稍诚实的人都不会拿自己的生命和美德去冒那种险。
Either too unsophisticated or too honest to promise more than he could deliver.

做出超出自己能力的许诺，这不是因为太老练就是因为太诚实。
When two honest witnesses give accounts of the same event that differ diametrically, how can anyone prove that the evidence you gave was deliberately false?
Dāng liǎng gè chéngshí de zhèngrén duì tóng yí jiàn shì zuòchūle jiéránbùtóng de jiěshì shí，rénmen zěnyàng cáinéng zhèngmíng nǐ gěi chū de zhèngjù shì yǒuyì niēzào de？
当两个诚实的证人对同一件事做出了截然不同的解释时，人们怎样才能证明你给出的证据是有意捏造的？

mínzú zìháogǎn
a sense of national pride
自豪感
zìháogǎn
sense of pride
我们为你获得冠军感到自豪。
Wǒmen wèi nǐ huòdé guànjūn gǎndàozìháo。
We are very proud that you won the championship.
Her heart swelled up with pride.
Tā de nèixīn chōngmǎn zìháogǎn。
她的内心充满自豪感。
Riley swelled with pride at the ceremony.
Zài diǎnlǐ shàng，Láilì chōngmǎnle zìháogǎn。
在典礼上，莱利充满了自豪感。
Yesterday I got such a good bargain, I\'m really proud of myself.
昨天我做了一笔很上算的买卖，我真为我自己感到自豪。
I\'m proud of my mother, not ashamed of her .
我为我妈妈感到自豪，而不是为她感到羞愧。
The class swelled up with pride after winning the contest.
Yíngdé bǐsài zhīhòu，zhège bān bèigǎn zìháo。
赢得比赛之后，这个班倍感自豪。
to be proud of sb/sth
为某人/某事感到自豪
to be proud that...
为…感到自豪
She told me that, as a child, she was very proud of their W.C. (water closet).
Tā gàosu，zuòwéi xiǎohái，tā hěn wéi tāmen de wèishēngjiān gǎndào zìháo。
她告诉，作为小孩，她很为他们的卫生间感到自豪。
I adored myself for making them so happy.
Wǒ wèi ràng tāmen rúcǐ kāixīn ér gǎndào zìháo。
我为让他们如此开心而感到自豪。
In her way she kept faith，and I was proud of her.
Cóng tā de jiǎodù shàng，tā xìnshǒule chéngnuò，wǒ wèi tā ér gǎndào zìháo。
从她的角度上，她信守了承诺，我为她而感到自豪。
We should all take pride in these successes.
Wǒmen yīnggāi duì zhèxiē chénggōng gǎndào zìháo。
我们应该对这些成功感到自豪。
Golf is one of his blind spots and he\'s proud of it.

他对高尔夫球一窍不通，对此他还感到很自豪。
He felt a great sense of pride when he received the graduation certificate.
获得毕业证书时，他感到无比自豪。
I felt so proud of my father for having been such a fine craftsman.
Wǒ de fùqīn shì rúcǐ yōuxiù de gōngjiàng，wǒ gǎndào fēicháng zìháo。
我的父亲是如此优秀的工匠，我感到非常自豪。
民族自豪感
mínzú zìháogǎn
a sense of national pride
改革初期，农民害怕被称作富裕户；今天以冒富而自豪。
Gǎigé chūqī，nóngmín hàipà bèi chēngzuò fùyùhù; jīntiān yǐ màofù ér zìháo。
In the early stages of reform, farmers were afraid to be considered well-off, but today they are proud of doing better than average.
自豪感
zìháogǎn
sense of pride
我们为你获得冠军感到自豪。
Wǒmen wèi nǐ huòdé guànjūn gǎndàozìháo。
We are very proud that you won the championship.
他出身名门豪族，但自立自强，从不依赖家里。

He is born into a wealthy and influential family, but he is independent and self-supportive.
自豪。
我们以伟大的祖国自豪。
自豪地站立在领奖台上。
我们为有这样的英雄而自豪。
If we carry ourselves with pride, our self-esteem will increase.

如果我们一直让自己保持自豪，我们的自尊心会增强。
Attendees proudly paraded their high-end designer footwear.
Chūxízhě zìháo de zhǎnshìle tāmen chūzì gāojí shèjìshī zhī shǒu de xiézi。

The town boasts a fine new library.
这个城镇以有一个好的新图书馆而自豪。

自豪/满意的心情

洋溢着喜悦/自豪之情

以做某事为豪
to be proud of sb/sth
为某人/某事感到自豪
to be proud that...
为…感到自豪
to swell with pride
[liter] 充满自豪
She is the sole heir of the Marriott fortune.
她是万豪产业的唯一继承人。
He was tanked after a long night of drinking.

一晚上的豪饮之后，他喝多了。

我豪不怀疑，泡沫将破裂。

This 5 star hotel combines traditional style with contemporary comfort and luxury.

我为自己想到另一个聪明的点子而自豪。

纵隔炎
zònɡɡéyán 
mediastinitis
种族隔离
zhǒng zú gélí
racial segregation; apartheid
种族隔离
zhǒng zú gélí
racial segregation
南非种族隔离
Nánfēi zhǒngzúgélí
apartheid
De facto segregation is as real as segregation imposed by law.
Shíjì cúnzài de zhǒngzúgélí xiàng fǎlǜ shàng de zhǒngzúgélí yíyàng zhēnshí。
实际存在的种族隔离像法律上的种族隔离一样真实。
As a horror，apartheid...is absolutely unambiguous.
Zhǒngzúgélí shì yì zhǒng kǒngbù……Háobùhánhú。
种族隔离是一种恐怖……毫不含糊。
racial barriers
种族隔离
There were some demonstrations in the 1960\'s when schools in the United States were being integrated.
在20世纪60年代，美国的学校取消种族隔离时，有一些游行示威发生。
Schools were integrated to eliminate discrimination.
取消学校的种族隔离是为了消灭歧视。
Under segregation there were even white restrooms and white drinking fountains.
Zài zhǒngzúgélí niándài，shènzhì yǒu báirén wèishēngjiān hé báirén yǐnshuǐjī。
在种族隔离年代，甚至有白人卫生间和白人饮水机。

Shènzhì zài nàxiē“xīn”de fēizhōuguójiā zhōng，shìshíshàng de zhǒngzúgélí yīrán cúnzài。
甚至在那些“新”的非洲国家中，事实上的种族隔离依然存在。
This neighborhood is segregated.
Zhège Shèqū cúnzài zhǒngzúgélí。
这个社区存在种族隔离。
We don\'t segregate in this county.
Wǒmen zhège Guójiā méiyǒu zhǒngzúgélí。
我们这个国家没有种族隔离。
This school is completely desegregated.

这个学校彻底废除了种族隔离。
杰克隐居山林，一直过着与世隔绝的生活。
Jiékè yǐnjū shānlín，yìzhí guò zhe yǔshì géjué de shēnghuó。
Jack lived in seclusion in the mountain forest and cut himself off from the rest of the world.
他在乡村过着与世隔绝的生活。
Tā zàixiāngcūn guòzhe yǔshìgéjuéde shēnghuó。
He led a completely isolated life in the countryside.
与世隔绝
The ship was grounded on an isolated island.
Chuán zài yí gè yǔshìgéjué de xiǎodǎo shàng gēqiǎn le。
船在一个与世隔绝的小岛上搁浅了。

Táobì xiànshí yě jiù yìwèizhe yǔshìgéjué。
逃避现实也就意味着与世隔绝。
The inhabitants of this isolated village tend to inmarry.

这个与世隔绝的村庄只在他们村庄内部通婚。

Tā jìnxíngle yìzhǒng yǔshìgéjué de sīkǎo。
他进行了一种与世隔绝的思考。

相隔千里
xiānggé qiānlǐ
be a thousand li away from each other
相隔万里
xiānggé wàn lǐ
be thousands of li apart; be a long way away from each other
相隔多年
xiānggé duō nián
after an interval of many years
与春分点相隔180°的另一点，就是秋分点。
Yǔ chūnfēn diǎn xiānggé yìbǎibāshí dù de lìng yìdiǎn，jiùshì qiūfēn diǎn。
The autumnal equinox is the point in the opposite direction of the vernal equinox.

The two places aren\'t far apart.

他们两个思想观念相差很大，如隔参商。

他进行了一种与世隔绝的思考。
虽然时隔多年，那事他犹然记得很清楚。
Suīrán shígéduōnián，nà shì tā yóurán jì de hěn qīngchu。
After so many years, he still remembers it clearly.
时间隔得太久，印象也就淡薄了。
Shíjiān gé de tài jiǔ，yìn xiàng yě jiù dànbó le。
With the passage of time, these impressions became dim.
他写拼音时，把隔音符号给忘了。
Tā xiě pīnyīn shí，bǎ géyīn fúhào gěi wàng le。
He forgot the syllable-dividing marks when he was writing down pinyin.
At this distance we cannot know Neanderthal men.
时隔久远，我们现在不可能了解尼安得特人了。
The next door neighbors were playing basketball in our neighbor\'s driveway.
当时隔壁的几个邻居正在附近的车道上打篮球。
The fact I have remembered its message after 12 years is a testimony to its effectiveness.
Wǒ néng zài shígé shí\'èr nián hòu hái jìdé tā de xìnxī，zhè zúyǐzhèngmíng tā de xiàolì zhī gāo。
我能在时隔十二年后还记得它的信息，这足以证明它的效力之高。
At a distance of ten years he had forgotten many of the details.
Shígé shí nián hòu，tā wàngjìle hěnduō xìjié。
时隔十年后，他忘记了很多细节。
at irregular intervals
不定时的间隔
There is a difficulty in measuring the time lag with sufficient accuracy.

在阻止天花传染方面，圆形地区隔离是一种得到验证的有效方法。

隔音设备
南北悬隔，杳无音信。

这些具有非常好的隔音效果，能够帮助隔离外界的声音。

列标签之间要用空格符隔开。
The large machine was railed off as a safety precaution.
Dàxíng jīxiè yào yòng wéilán gékāi，zuòwéi ānquán yùfáng cuòshī。

The kitchen was boxed off and separated from the living room.

厨房与起居室是隔开的。
The headmaster\'s room is partitioned off at one end of the building.

校长的房间在这栋建筑的一边，是隔开的。
The boundary should be roped off to your right.
Biānjiè yīnggāi zài nǐ yòubiān yòng shéngzi gékāi。
边界应该在你右边用绳子隔开。
They ruled off many things on menu.

Gāi fángjiān bèi yí gè jùdà de chuānglián fēngé kāilái。
该房间被一个巨大的窗帘分隔开来。
Tables are also well spaced apart, allowing for discreet social or business conversation.
Zhuōzi bèi hěn hǎo de gékāi，kěyǐ jìnxíng zhèngshì de shèhuì hé shāngyè tánhuà。

仓库后面有一个部分被分隔了开来。

be cut off from the outside world

A new family moved into our neighborhood, they seem to be easy to get along with.
医院里的各种传染病人一定要隔离好，防止交叉感染。
Yīyuàn lǐ de gèzhǒng chuánrǎn bìngrén yídìng yào gélí hǎo，fángzhǐ jiāochā gǎnrǎn。
Patients suffering from infectious diseases should be quarantined in case of cross-infection.
我们要暌隔那么久，你一定要自己照顾好自己！
Wǒmen yào kuígé nàme jiǔ，nǐ yídìng yào zìjǐ zhàogù hǎo zìjǐ！
We will be away from each other for a long time, so you must take good care of yourself.
落照隔着纱帘照进房间，真是美极了。
Luòzhào gé zhe shālián zhàojìn fángjiān，zhēnshì měi jí le。
The glow of the setting sun penetrates into the room through the gauze curtain, it\'s extremely beautiful.
磨花玻璃的用途很广泛，用来隔断客厅的空间也很不错。
Móhuā bōli de yòngtú hěnguǎngfàn，yònglái géduàn kètīng de kōngjiān yě hěnbúcuò。
Frosted glass has wide applications.  It is satisfactory to use it to divide the parlour.
他们两个思想观念相差很大，如隔参商。
Tāmen liǎnggè sīxiǎngguānniàn xiāngchà hěn dà，rúgéshēnshāng。
They differ greatly in ideology.
传说中的牛郎星和织女星被天汉隔在两边。
Chuánshuō zhōng de niúlángxīng hé zhīnǚxīng bèi tiānhàn gé zài liǎngbiān。
Legend has it that the two stars, the Cowherd and the Weaver, are separated from each other by the Milky Way.
我和他现在真是天悬地隔啊，完全不是一个层次的人。
Wǒ hé tā xiànzài zhēnshì tiānxuán dìgé a，wánquán búshì yígè céngcì de rén。
He is so different from me now, we are not the same type of people anymore.
听说隔壁村有个人投水自杀了。
Tīngshuō gébì cūn yǒu gè rén tóushuǐ zìshā le。
It is said that someone in the neighboring village has drowned himself.
隔壁邻居家的大门上贴着大红的喜联。
Gébì línjū jiā de dàmén shàng tiē zhe dàhóng de xǐlián。
My neighbor put red wedding couplets on their front door.
两军实力在伯仲之间，隔江相峙，战争一触即发。
Liǎngjūn shílì zài bózhòng zhījiān，géjiāng xiāngzhì，zhànzhēng yíchù jífā。
With almost the same power, the two armies confronted each other across the river where the battle will soon start.
隔壁邻居家新买了一辆雪佛兰小卧车。
Gébì línjū jiā xīnmǎi le yí liàng xuěfólán xiǎowòchē。
My neighbor has just bought a Chevrolet.
这羊有点咬群，赶快隔离开吧。
Zhè yáng yǒudiǎn yǎoqún，gǎnkuài gélí kāi ba。
The sheep is prone to fight within the flock, it should be isolated soon.
音乐厅的隔音设备是从美国进口的。
Yīnyuètīng de géyīn shèbèi shì cóng Měiguó jìnkǒu de。
The sound insulation equipment in the concert hall was imported from the US.
培育这种花卉需要每隔三天壅土一次。
Péiyù zhèzhǒng huāhuì xūyào měi gé sāntiān yōng tǔ yícì。
People should heap soil over and around the roots of this flower every three days.
虽然在隔壁房间，可还能听到她幽咽的哭声。
Suīrán zài gébì fángjiān，kě háinéng tīngdào tā yōuyān de kūshēng。
Though staying in the room next door, I can still hear her low sobs.
杰克隐居山林，一直过着与世隔绝的生活。

Jack lived in seclusion in the mountain forest and cut himself off from the rest of the world.
台湾和新疆远隔千山万水，你最好坐飞机去。

Tā xiě pīnyīn shí，bǎ géyīn fúhào gěi wàng le。

Uncle Wang, who lives next door, accidentally saved a nautilus.

Diànnǎo bāozhuāngxiāng lǐ yǒu hǎoduō yòngyú fángzhèn gécháo de pàomò sùliào。
There is a lot of anti-shock waterproof foam in a computer packing box.

The two places aren\'t far apart.

bǎ yìjiānfáng fēngéchéng liǎngxiǎojiān

依依惜别的场景
yīyīxībié de chǎngjǐng 
sentimental parting scene
两人依依惜别，难舍难分。
Liǎngrén yīyīxībié，nánshěnánfēn。
The two of them could hardly tear themselves away from each other.
依依惜别
yīyīxībié 
be reluctant to part
老师们怀着惜别的心情，送走了毕业同学。
Lǎoshīmen huái zhe xībié de xīnqíng，sòngzǒu le bìyè tóngxué。
The teachers reluctantly parted with the graduates.
在此依依惜别的时刻
zài cǐ yīyīxībié de shíkè 
at this moment when we reluctantly bid farewell to each other
离别时刻他们俩难分难舍，又说了好多惜别的话。
Líbié shíkè tāmenliǎ nánfēn nánshě，yòu shuō le hǎo duō xībié de huà。
At the time to bid farewell, the two could hardly tear themselves apart from each other, and kept talking.
大学毕业了，同学们依依惜别，不知何时再相聚。
Dàxué bìyè le，tóngxuémen yīyī xībié，bùzhī héshí zài xiāngjù。
When we graduated from the university, we said goodbye reluctantly to each other without knowing when we would get together again.
他长别人世，使人悲痛惋惜。
Tā chángbié rénshì，shǐ rén bēitòng wǎnxī。
His departure left people grief-stricken.
依依惜别。
